Name: Jayaditya soni
Review_Text: Infrastructure,  ambience , security systems I love the ffcs system which allows me to create my own timetable The professors, the club culture and hackathons

Name: Pratik Kadam
Review_Text: Mess food is mediocre and is not that nutritious Frequent crashing of the portals when it comes to registration No ac for classrooms alloted for btech students

Name: Priyanka
Review_Text: Everywhere wifi is available in campus .The mess and canteen are good. Labs and discussion rooms are well-designed.Many events are held in our college.our campus is free from ragging.we can enjoy in weekends. Teachers are helpful. They have good knowledge. The curriculum is very well-designed. Our university is worth joining because of its excellent infrastructure, good placement opportunities, and a wide range of courses.

Name: vindya
Review_Text: the grading system is based on the class score, which determines the grades S, A, B, C, D, or F. At every event, they will take at least INR 200, and some students will not able to join In the recent fest, they charged INR 2,000 per student. If you want to have some fun at your own college fest, you can't

Name: Shalini roy
Review_Text: Timings, food not bad, staff, clubs,sports Placements are not bad the staff and collage management are trying to everyone to get job Faculty is good but not percent the way of staff is like to be partiality

Name: Harshit gautam
Review_Text: Timings of college. They have alloted the classes in different timings To much of strength like 3000 students only for 1 st year Too much competition for placements.i have not liked that management have taken to much admissions.

Name: Anagh Verma
Review_Text: COLLEGE FEE IS LOW FOR STUDENTS WHO JOINED THROUGH EAMCET EXAM WE CAN JOIN HERE IN THREE TYPE OF WAYS EAMCET, VITEEE,IP. WE CAN IMPROVE LANGUAGE LIKE STUDENTS WILL CAME FROM MAX ALL THE STATES IN INDIA

Name: Rajat Jain
Review_Text: WE HAVE MOVE CLASS FROM ONE BLOCK TO ANOTHER BLOCKS ONE AFTER OTHER WE GET ATTADANCE THROUGH BIOMETRIC. SOME TIMES IT WILL NOT WORK PROPERLY HISTER RULES ARE VERY SRTICT. BATH WATER IS THAT MUCH GOOD IN NY HOSTEL

Name: Pushpendra Kushwaha
Review_Text: The infrastructure and availability of all the things you want There is no ragging at all and the seniors are so friendly  The fests and activities happens every week

Name: Santushti
Review_Text: The mess quality in the hostel should increase There will be class changes for every semester You can’t bond with your friends so well as there will be class changes

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: supportive senior : senior of vit are really very  cool they help you in understanding the college and its environment riveria: it is a fest which happen every year . so many artits come every year and believe me if you attend this it will be the best experience of your life hostels: hostels of vit are much better when compare to iit. iits room are very small

Name: Aishwarya Shaji
Review_Text: fees: fees is really very very high it becomes very difficult for a middle class person to study here transparency in result: lots of student are not happy with the result they got very high percentile in jee mains but end up getting low marks in vit becausethere is something wrong in their result Faculty are very nice and cooperative and explain industry better

Name: Ansu Raj
Review_Text: Extra ciricular activities provided are fun in nature You get to do networking and meet many students from different cultures I like the way faculty teaches us in a clear cut way

Name: kabila J
Review_Text: I like the course cse because of my skillson it I like the campus life which entrust us to get job I don't like they are many students in college

Name: Dhiren
Review_Text: The disciple provided here is the best i like It is the green campus where you’ll find trees every corner Relation between students and teachers and ffcs

Name: Tanmay Vikas Admuthe
Review_Text: Infrastructure- the college’s infrastructure is very nice. We have a huge campus with all sports facilities. There is an attendance relaxation system for all the students who secure a score of 9 cgpa or more. FFCS- we have a fully flexible credit system where we can choose our courses, class timings like morning theory or evening theory and even our faculties.

Name: Yathin
Review_Text: Too much crowd - the intake of students is very high The in-time for the college main gate is 7 pm and 9 pm for hostels. The wifi is not provided after 12:30 am at night.

Name: Gandla sasank
Review_Text: One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech FFCS. Name: Valluru mohammad rasheed
Review_Text: I like my college infrastructure and maintainence There will be less clubs in our college. I liked the campus life and freedom in the college.

Name: Pratik Ranjan
Review_Text: I liked the clubs and chapters in the university We can join any club on our choice and perform well I disliked the fees criteria in the university.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The strict rules of the security was most disliked. The fees are different for different people based on their exam percentage. Our college has a good location and I will give it a 10/10 for that proper cleanliness and greenery with proper environment

Name: Sunneth
Review_Text: Sports and technical events add another star to this. Faculties are also good they try their best in teachings and also classrooms are pretty amazing Wifi connection is really poor here and it gives a speed almost 1mbps

Name: Harshit Chowdhry
Review_Text: Hostel to college distance is really large it is 3 km total and you have to either walk or to go with the cycle. Grounds are not properly labelled you can say ground is really Rocky. Its social life , the opportunities that it gives and also the friends we make along the way and the hostel life

Name: Vivek koti
Review_Text: Its curriculum based study and also caltech Teachers , full phd faculty , fast development of campus despite it being only 6 years old The campus which is not totally developed

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The roads , no proper playing ground and also no proper entertainment facility Also that it is located in a remote location and we cant really go out for outing for anything exciting College's infrastructure and academics. Fest

Name: Tarun
Review_Text: College fest and different types of clubs Leave system and cantine food is like cafe Hostel supervisor is arrogant and doesn't talk properly

Name: Amey Gaikwad
Review_Text: Hostel warden is arrogant and doesn't talk properly Security is unnecessarily tight colleg doesn't allow us to eat outside food Environment in this college is very nice. It has a lot of trees and plants

Name: Rushikesh Kumthekar
Review_Text: There are so many sport equipment which will help us to play easily. Staff here are so good and so welcoming to the students. Biometric system in hostel is so suffocating due to over crowd in the class time

Name: Sujit Hulule
Review_Text: In some places the roads are not that good Food in some hostels are not that good it can be improved Social life, campus life, education and its ambience

Name: Naman Srivastava
Review_Text: The sunsets here are pretty amazing. The campus is lush green Less than half of the campus is under construction but the ones that is built is pretty cool The connectivity between the main cities

Name: Pranav
Review_Text: There are too many restrictions in hostel Any inconvenience is not sorted easily. You have to visit too many authorities for some silly reason. Oppertunity and placement offers and transfer

Name: VARUN RAWAT
Review_Text: Support of faculties and focus about our ideas Environment and natural view also the clubs Under construction campus a bit dusty daily

Name: Abhijeet Tripathy
Review_Text: No vehicle are allowed only cycle and walking Rules are very strict and not fully constructed ground The FFCS program which gives the leniency to the students to select their professors

Name: Abhinav jain
Review_Text: The student clubs which encourage students to actively participate in the social activities The placement oriented study from the first year itself The college doesnt have a big ground to play for the big tournaments

Name: Srimadhav
Review_Text: The place was good for roming and spending time with friends The clg will be has gyms and many things for time pass also Many club will be in this clg which will help in placement

Name: Keneisha
Review_Text: Place was somewhat small when compared to different universities Facilities was not too good they are just goid This has to many students the strength was to high

Name: Mukti
Review_Text: One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech FFCS. Name: Nikhil Mehlan
Review_Text: Canteen facilities which include all varities and cuisines of food for poeple all over india, Digital classrooms which include AC , projector. Ability to design our won degree, which is unique to VIT campuses.

Name: Parth Jha
Review_Text: Communication skills of faculty , They rarely speak in english. Distance from the main city, Vijayawada. Its almost 1 hr long which makes it difficult in case of emergencies. Lack of persional washrooms . You need to share washroom with 10 other people.

Name: AVIRAL SINGH
Review_Text: Flexibility of student's timetable. Students are allowed to choose their timeslots for their courses. Students choose the faculties of their respective course. Placement cell's assistance to the student those who need, helping to improve their placements.

Name: Devangan
Review_Text: Every course has its seperate class, so the classes and students keep changing everytime. Great amount social peers to interact with Highly diverse cultural audience and students

Name: Shubhashish
Review_Text: Security of the campus and hostel facility Too much security everywhere and restrictions Too many permissions needed to go out of the campus

Name: Rupesh chandrashekhar dahibhate
Review_Text: The distance between the academic building and the hostels are also very much. College hostels was very well maintained  The college has good greenery in and around the campus

Name: Yugant Chaudhury
Review_Text: You have good canteens inside the college and also stationary  There are way too many students studying in this college  The hostel gym is not well-maintained and is very crowded

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: They do not have a zero-attendance policy in the college. Technical fest of VIT BHOPAL is amazing. Faculty and staff are very Good and they are helpull in many aspects.

Name: ANIKET RAI
Review_Text: Food quality and taste of the food is very good. For each and every event they charge money feels like are greedy. There are so much restrictions for going out of campus.

Name: Swaroop W
Review_Text: There are not much development most of the things are under construction so you will always hear noise in hostels. the food quality at the mayuri and underbelly place is pretty good , they serve all kinds of food . this college has some very exceptional iitians as teachers who are genuinely very fond of their subjects and make their students love their subjects as well

Name: Rishi
Review_Text: the canteen fees is pretty high and the quantity is often less according to other fastfood chain restaurants many high professors aren't very much interested in their subjects and often are looking to make an example out of their students if they are involved in anything or if they even perform poorly in their exams. The overall college experience is good actually

Name: Uday
Review_Text: The timing of classes if your own choice Hostel life is better than any other college Too much competition as people are there from parts of the country

Name: Pallav rai
Review_Text: Events have cost, sometimes it's a bit more There's a lot of crowd inside the college I liked the well equipped laboratories for respective subjects.

Name: Sushanto Das
Review_Text: The campus is well maintained and very green. A great exposure is provided to students and regular events are held. The rules are extremely strict which restricts us from doing many things.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The college is overpopulated and campus sometimes feels conjusted. Students can not go to other hostels to meet their friends or study along with them I like play grounds we have and time flexibility

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: I like the maintenance of our college and bathroom maintenance Faculties are the main reason to join this college The location od our college is far away from city

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: It is difficult to get out from the college in emergency situation There are no more resources around our colleges Infact there is no ragging by the seniors

Name: Ayush Mishra
Review_Text: Much more place to play sports like cricket,football etc The student can opt for dual degree program in second semester who passed first year with 8.5CGPA We can login only one time with wifi credentials in respective blocks

Name: Vineet jain
Review_Text: The transportation facility from this college Network signal is bad in this locality and sometimes call may be disconnected One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech

Name: Yash Vaishnav
Review_Text: Various clubs are encouraged in the college and students are given support to go into the direction they wish for The teaching could be a bit better in the college The food that they serve is good but it can be made better

Name: RISHAB MUNJAL
Review_Text: i like in this collage is 2 days holydays in every week infrastructure is so good with clean and green campus is so peaceful of lovely environment

Name: Suprit Kothari
Review_Text: i only thing that  i didn,t like is wifi connection is poor some computers will not work properly in labs all important messages are sent through mails only and they don't allow to leave collage before 5 pm

Name: Duddu bala Guru Venkata Arjun
Review_Text: The green and beautiful flowers and trees around us The teaching faculty and their friendly nature of our faculty The college friends and the enjoy emerging they produce

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The security around us for every one step Holiday given on monday which can be converted to saturday Less interaction of girls with boys and teacher

Name: Manna
Review_Text: Feel free campus with co-education and friends Big opportunities to get a job in big companies Big ground and much sports equipment for students

Name: Aman Kumar
Review_Text: We have to get into hostel room within 8:30 pm The question paper toughness level is very high More restrictions to go out of campus even it is emergency

Name: Gajula Padmatej
Review_Text: The time table is great with free time and we get Monday as non instructional day We have enough sports equipments and everyone play together in college We enjoy every weekend  showcasing talents.

Name: Prateek panda
Review_Text: University got many students this year so it a bit rush. construction is going on even on working days Some faculty just read the PowerPoint and explain moderately which isn't correct

Name: NISHANTH RB
Review_Text: College life , that includes both academic and non academic life. Clubs. Your chances of development are increased by joining , working and interacting with club members . Food facilities , i.e. interested students can eat from Maggie hotspot , Rock Plaza , Food Street ,etc.

Name: Divya Tandon
Review_Text: Strictness is the major red flag , observed in VIT-AP. High fines on even minor negligence by the student . Very high intake of students from different modes of admission .

Name: Khilesh Vijay Bhangale
Review_Text: For outing at weekend management providing buses Infrastructure here is very good and maintainance is also good Hostel rooms are much comfortable than i thought

Name: Motinath
Review_Text: There is no kabaddi mat for sports linking persons For attempting sem exams attendance should be 80 percentage Rules here are very clumsy and giving fine for silly reasons

Name: Rajdeep Das
Review_Text: The flexibility of moving from hostel to college and vice versa The flexible schedule of the cirrcullum having two half days in a week and holiday on Sundays and Mondays The sports faculty and library of the college are good enough

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The process of examination is divided in three phases which makes it hectic You are assigned a mentor without whose permission you can't go out of the campus You are allowed for outings only on Sundays and Mondays and in case of any emergency only

Name: Srinivas
Review_Text: Architecture and the environment is the main reason Students are also encouraged to participate in the programs Faculty and teachers with their respective departments

Name: Nikitha
Review_Text: The only thing I can say is that the the campus is too big The students were not all some of them are not good Faculty, Play ground, events, the nature

Name: Srinivas
Review_Text: Friendly nature of faculty, Good in placements Hygienic maintenance in the college is the best thing The Mess experience, hostel experience not good

Name: Arghya Chakrabarty
Review_Text: One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech FFCS. Name: Prashanthi Jagannathan
Review_Text: Hygiene and clean environment through vit ap university  Faculty regarding the doubt clarification  Sports and  clubs events are for enjoying at the campus

Name: Sriman narayanan
Review_Text: Security guard very strict regarding fines& regarding id card  No breaks regarding the class hour's for students  Systems won't work properly in some labs of the university

Name: Karan Baid
Review_Text: Campus placements are very good in this college Living far from the city and too much auto rates Canteen and cafes parks logbes and many more

Name: Aryan soni
Review_Text: The classroom and seminar hall are excellent. The prices in canteen and cafes should be decrease. Flexible credit system the Customization they provide is soo comfortable

Name: SATYAJEET SWAIN
Review_Text: The campus life. Freedom given to students lower rules and regulations Infrastructure they are developing at a very fast rate like since i have joined they have built atleast 3 new buildings Transportation since this university is located in amaravathi which is near Vijayawada but not in Vijayawada it would consume more time for journey

Name: Manas Doshi
Review_Text: Air-conditioning since this college is located in andhra pradesh the climate is soo hot here but there are no sufficient air conditioners for the students The circulum since they conduct 2 mids and one sem which is quite hectic like you dint get enough time to learn you interests The infrastructure of the college ,I liked it ,the feeling when I walking in the college it is like just a experience of a foreign college .

Name: Prachetan venigandla
Review_Text: The way of course registration,the courses are choosed by the students only Hospital in campus ,in the case of any emergency there is immediate action in the campus only ,24/7 facility is a good thing by the college . Individual places for some sports are not there like kabaddi the players are feeling like nervous if they play on land instead of mat for injuries.

Name: Dhruv
Review_Text: Fees, for hostels they put high fee of lakhs due to that many middle class families can't afford to put their child in the campus hostel . If a student got selected in this campus in the way other than emcet the fee is very high to those students. The main thing I like that this university was campus life

Name: SHANMUKH SAI
Review_Text: The infrastructure of the campus was also good The campus was too far from the city or town We can't go out when ever we want.once we entered in the campus we can't go out.

Name: Mukesh Kumar S
Review_Text: EDUCATION AND INFRASTRUCTURE AND FOOD QUALITY GOOD TEACHING AND FACULTIES WITH GOOD EXPERIENCE LIBRARY AND ENTERTAINMENT AND FREE ENVIRONMENT AND EVENTS PARTIES

Name: Tushar chahar
Review_Text: FEES IS TOO HIGH AND CO-EDUCATION IS BIGGEST DIS ADVANTAGE IT IS BETTER FOR TO DIFFERENTIATE CLASSES FOR LADIES AND MEN There are indoor games like chess badminton carrom

Name: Md Hashir Hussain
Review_Text: There is food Street rock plaza Maggie hotspot to eat whatever we like There are outdoor games like cricket basketball to play in leisure time There is long distance between academic and central blocks

Name: NIRMIT BANSAL
Review_Text: There is no air conditioner in theory class rooms Transportation fee is too high and timings are from morning 9 to evening 6 pm I like my college infrastructure and college clubs in vit ap

Name: Ujjwal Jain
Review_Text: There are less maintenance in labs and classroom There are indoor games like badminton chess table tennis to play in leisure time There are outdoor games like cricket basketball volleyball to play in free time

Name: Vansh Malhotra
Review_Text: There is food street rock plaza maggie hotspot to eat whatever we like Transportation fee is too high that is 42300 per year There is long distance between academic and central blocks

Canteen is also a obvious choice for the students in the university liked the most. where we can chit chat with our friends.

Name: V N Arvindhan
Review_Text: The campus environment is the one thing that I liked here. We have a lot of students coming all over from India anf and you can also find some students from abroad. Fully flexible system, where you can choose your subjects, professors and timings Food availability inside the campus is decent and you almost get everything that you want to eat

Name: Swathi Shanmugam
Review_Text: Location of the campus is a disadvantage, as it's too far from the city Fee is a bit high for some courses. If the student is not from eapcet then he must pay more amount of money The availability of hostels is a concern here. Not everyone here gets the hostel, it depends upon your cgpa and if it's too less you may not get the hostel inside the campus

Name: VS Krishnan
Review_Text: Campus infrastructure and discipline in clg AC s are available in laboratories and libraries Library is big and all type of books are available

Name: Aviral Asthana
Review_Text: University is too far from city , Vijayawada Outing timings are not flexible to student Hostel fee is too high for middle clas families

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Campus is too good and climate also soo good Library is big and so many books are available Ac in labs and libraries and canteens in unversity

Name: Manish Kumar Shukla
Review_Text: Climate is too hot in summer and too cool in winter There no transportation near university. prices of auto is too high Prices in cafeteria nad rockplaza are too high

Name: Viswa Sai
Review_Text: Ambiance In our college is too good. We can walk wherever we want in our free time We have food street and rock plaza in our campus. And we can eat whatever we want. We have a place called zuzu Where we have the best food we all should try.

Name: Devyanshu gagneja
Review_Text: The thing I dislike is we have to wear Id card wherever we go If we don't have irregard they don't allow us to enter the campus There is no AC in the college and we can't survive in summer as it is Vijayawada. The sun is more concentrated in Vijayawada only. They make us wait for more time In the canteen, when we order food and the price is too high, which we can't bear.

Review_Text: The things I liked in vit ap is the Infrastructure And also the comfort by the environment which is surrounded by green trees Also the rock plaza and food Street where students can eat and chill with their friends

Review_Text: ground infront of mh4  which we so uncomfortble and it is beside of the hotsppot. The time of which the classes we have to attend were the best The clubs and social activities which are conducted were well organised

Review_Text: The place and the atmosphere was pleasant. The food and the prices were to high and quality must be improved There is no air conditioner in our university which is so hard to suffer from this climate

Review_Text: The explanation from some faculty was different and they are just showing the PPT slides and reading Library is quite good .And infra structure is awesome  Play ground is good and and digital Library with well equipped computers

Review_Text: And faculty is main thing I liked in my college  My college is far away from city there are no resources  In emergency situation it is quite difficult to go out of the college

Review_Text: The crowdiness is another thing I don't like we see a lot of people and there will be no facilities for day scholars if they don't have any classes. fully flexible credit system is there in our campus In library we have all facilities and digital library is also availble here

Review_Text: The infrastructure of the college is nice. The Subject has a Theory part along with Practical part. Both are considered for evaluation. The Library is good. And the prices are very less.

Review_Text: The fee you have to pay if you fail an exam is very high. Its 6,000 per subject. The fines for violating some rules are also very high. I paid 100rs for forgetting ID card on an exam and the process is also annoying. The failed exams should be written in Summer where others are having Sem break.

Review_Text: The infrastructure here is mind blowing.. The cultural fests here are mind blowing.. Most of the faculty teaches excellent and super

Infrastructure is one of important thing we need to discuss about vit. As the infrastructure and planning of construction is top notch. Even though the campus is not completly constructed it is well executed and maintained as it looks good. In campus we will be having food court, grocery items and medical shop which helps us buy necessary things in emergency.

There are no shops or anything outside the campus upto 5km there is an empty land and if we need anything we need to travel to Vijayawada which of 20km from the campus Hostel booking is based on cgpa which everybody cant get an proper room which are interested in .even the cgpa is 8.7 I'm not able to select the required room to me.

We can Rome in the College upto 8 20 in night in the campus we can chitchat with girls this the one of the best positive thing

Review_Text: the pressure you get in some semesters  because of the durations The culture and the structure of academics Amenities and the hygenity in rooms and classrooms

Review_Text: I also like the culture of meeting many people I like the food outlets present in the college The rules are a bit harsh for an average engineering student

Review_Text: No college life is fulfilled in this college The hostel restrictions specially for girls are too much Study  is so good and getting places averagely

Review_Text: Providing of wifi and courses in studies Discipline  is nice in hostel and other places. Restrictions in college  and thier strictness

Name: Sunil Singh
Review_Text: Rules in hostels  and they are very harsh No play ground  to play in weekends and play hours Campus opportunities, campus life and environment

Name: Akash Singh
Review_Text: Clubs and fests and other co circular activities Student crowd and worst lift facilities even transport facility is worst The food was good according to me but some food is very bad.

Name: Ayush yadav
Review_Text: The hostel and the friendly nature of the students. The campus is very beautiful even though it's developing. The sports activities are very low and does not have a proper place to play the sports.

Name: Aditya Ravi
Review_Text: The gym is trash and does not have all the equipments. The campus is very crowded and the mess line is very long. Sports and extracurricular activities    are encouraged

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: You can join any club you are interested College atmosphere, faculty encouragement Placement assistance is weak when compared to VIT Chennai and Vellore campus

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: We can choose our own timing and faculty for course clg website to get courses to study different things (VITyarthi) Easy to meet teachers for doubt clearing

Name: Yash Sharma
Review_Text: Distance between hostel and academic block high price at canteen and cant take our own snacks inside Multiple blocks to study so have to travel from one block to another

Name: Bittu Raj
Review_Text: One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech FFCS. A study who is facing difficulty to study more, can take less number of credits and it will reduce the burden of the students. And the student can also Complete the entire course in 4 years instead of 5years  by taking maximum no of credits.  ~ Supriya R Patil, B.Sc + M.Sc Campus Life in Vit is simply magnificent.All types of facilities are provided inside the campus including sport complex and restaurants.The girls to boys ratio in Mechanical engineering is surprisinly high of about 1:7.  ~ Mithilesh Angal, B.Tech

Review_Text: The infrastructure is very advanced. If we enter the campus it seems like foreign institute. The culture of the peoples from different countries gathering in VIT. We can explore new things from various perspectives.

Name: Jayant Chand
Review_Text: There should be some privacy inside the campus. The whole area is covered by CCTVs Getting admission in VIT. Is difficult process. The products inside campus is little bit costly.

Name: Rohan Kumar
Review_Text: Flexible curriculum that allowed me to choose the classes and the timings. Opportunities for research and development. Thriving social life and relaxed environment compared to your school days.

Name: Amrita Sinha
Review_Text: The fee being a bit costlier for a middle class man. Lesser but developing in an international reach. Highly competitive in terms of academics, hence stress causing factors are pertinent.

Name: Aditya
Review_Text: Faculty, seniors and friends are always available for you. The infrastructure of VIT attracted me. There is no discrimination inside campus and faculties will behave like friends and family members.

Name: Shubham Jindal
Review_Text: The different type of cultures and peoples from various countries and states gather together here. We can explore new things. Some times the semester will end too faster. There are lots of procedures to get a leave.

Name: Anirban Roy
Review_Text: The seniors and fellow college mates are very helpful. Hardly any big fights or ragging occur The canteen food we have to pay for us fairly good The events the club's conduct and yearly culturals are fun

Name: Abhishek
Review_Text: The faculty quality is not upto the mark. The classes are mostly not engaging The hostel maintenance is horrible in few hostels VIT has great industrial connections which is helpful for VIT

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: It has a good fast growing culture and we many people from diverse places come to study here I liked the academic planning and course designing The climate is a bit harsh especially in summers

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The food in hostels is not upto the mark There is a problem in wifi connectivity in campus The average package is decent as compared to other private colleges.

Name: MITHUN H S
Review_Text: The number of students getting placed is also reasonable, which almost assures you a placemnet. The clubs here are very diverse accommodating everything, you have a club for everything you can possibly have a interest in. The rules and policies of the college are extremely strict.

Name: Harshit Reddy
Review_Text: Lack of proper sport facilities in the campus. More focused on studies than overall development of the student. VIT provides a holistic education to its students, with a focus on both academic and extracurricular activities.

Name: Ankit Basak
Review_Text: The university has a vibrant campus life, with numerous student clubs and organizations High-quality education and a supportive learning environment Vit is very strict regarding outing and other rules

Name: Aayush Thakur
Review_Text: The placements in our college were pretty good The campus has all the aminities required. The clubs and student chapters are amazing to explare

Name: Asmit Ranjan Sinha
Review_Text: The crowd of students is very huge. You see people everywhere They are very good at providing internships, and they do whatever is good for the students. They try their best for the students. If a student does well in their academics, they provide the best opportunities There is a centralized placement in VIT across all campuses, according to my best knowledge, and yeah, many good companies come every year for placements.

Name: rajan malewar
Review_Text: VIT hosts its annual fest at the end of the year. The library is very good, and the classrooms are designed to follow Caltech pedagogy. Sports such as cricket, football, badminton, table tennis, and basketball are also played. Fees can be slightly lower, but they are the only downside of this university. Not everyone can afford this expensive college, and there are no on-campus jobs available. You have to find an online job. The chief warden wouldnt permit you to go out if you have a bad impression in front of him; he is the biggest fool in the world.

Name: Anshu Kumar
Review_Text: Campus Life is really bad, as there arent many activities or things to do. The gender ratio is just like any other engineering college, and the labs are okay. The sports are also not at an average level, and there are no sports faculties present in t One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech FFCS. A study who is facing difficulty to study more, can take less number of credits and it will reduce the burden of the students. Name: KUMAR RISHIRAJ
Review_Text: The faculties and teaching is good and amenities in class and labs are good. The timetable gets change suddenly causing dilemma to students. The sites provided during the admission and ffcs process are not uploading to the mark and always gets error.

Name: shubham Shrivas
Review_Text: The food sometimes does not taste well . College life is very nice in vit ap all the sports activities club activities. The atmosphere near the college is where nice

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The curriculum of the college is a great thing that I have liked It's still an developing collage the infrastructure is not completed The security is very much strict there are many restrictions

Name: Adithya Narayan Swamy
Review_Text: Course Registration and flexible credits adjustment Holidays and weekly two days break and keen mentoring events and club events on weekends.Gym facility

Name: Envin
Review_Text: Exams will held without gap and tougher than we expect Playground is little bit small for playing any game transport facility to college is little bit problem for hostlers during holiday time

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Campus Life is very good . There is very plenty of space to walk Faculty is very good they are from IIT and NIT Placement in our college is very good .Each and every student will place at the time of placements

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Some of the faculty is very strict they don't even pass the students North Indian students domination is more University is always in constructed mode

Name: Tripurari Kumar Jha
Review_Text: Spacious hostel rooms, playing area for cricket, badminton, basketball. As the campus is far away for city they provide outing bus for us on sundays so that we can enjoy there and they also pick us up at a spot , to bring us back to campus. Moving from one block to other for classes. Fixing the timetable which is a hectic job.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The thing I liked was the college atmosphere. The thing I liked was the sports activities The thing l liked was the events counducted by the college

Name: MOHIT MOHANTY
Review_Text: The thing I disliked was the college structure The thing I disliked was the college architecture The thing I disliked was college and faculty

Name: Aashish Moond
Review_Text: Circular activities conducted by the university  And security in the university which doesn't happen any worst things in University  Conducting the events every Saturday which may give relax for us and holidays after sem which gives relax and can do internships

Name: Annu Grewal
Review_Text: Every thing should be done by the money which doesn't liked by the students  Some of the placements offers are not true which were done publicity by the university  High rates of food which doesn't be well for the students

Name: Jay Gupta
Review_Text: Flexibility system in the curriculum and management. Clubs participation and events present in the college. Technical skills teaching and making the skills on applicative way.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Hostels and the food present in the hostel. Transportation system to the college is quite hard because of constructions. One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech

Name: Mugunthan R
Review_Text: FFCS. A study who is facing difficulty to study more, can take less number of credits and it will reduce the burden of the students. And the student can also Complete the entire course in 4 years instead of 5years  by taking maximum no of credits.  ~ Supriya R Patil, B.Sc + M.Sc Campus Life in Vit is simply magnificent.All types of facilities are provided inside the campus including sport complex and restaurants.The girls to boys ratio in Mechanical engineering is surprisinly high of about 1:7.  ~ Mithilesh Angal, B.Tech I don’t like how the student and faculty ratio is 60-40  ~ Praveen Kumar, BCA

Name: Bhaibhav raj
Review_Text: Lot of exams yearly 3 exams in a semester 2-3 quiz and 1-2 DA  ~ Kartik Navnath Narare, B.Tech Water is really bad. 750+ TDS. It makes you go bald. Really.  ~ Piyush Prajapati, B.Des The dynamic and industry-relevant course curriculum at VIT.

Name: Paddu
Review_Text: Supportive and knowledgeable faculty contributing to a rich learning environment. Robust placement opportunities and assistance for career advancement. Limited flexibility in elective course selection.

Name: Arunkumar s
Review_Text: Occasional challenges with class scheduling. Some overcrowding in popular campus areas during peak hours Campus infrastructure is so nice and peaceful

Name: Adabala Lakshmi Nagesh
Review_Text: The hostel rooms are clean, good and hygienic Faculty choosen by students is not necessary. Mess food is good but the serving quantity differs.

Name: Gomathi Raj
Review_Text: I liked courses offered in my university I liked Skill development class in my university I liked the campus life and infrastructure in my university

Name: Shash
Review_Text: I didn't like the way faculty teach in my institute I didn't like the campus timings in my university I didn't like the campus fee in my university

Name: Sudharson
Review_Text: Hostel Life,gym facility, friendly faculty. Mess , food, less no of buildings, rod security Campus life is so good but we will get bored after one year

Name: Anil garg
Review_Text: Infrastrutture of the college is very good college has more space Faculty is also good some are from IITs and NITs Exams question papers are very difficult we can’t even pass

Name: Jatin mallarapu
Review_Text: Domination of North Indians in college is more Some of the faculty is very strict they don’t concern about students and they fails in exams Things I liked here is having a good faculty who is highly qualified to teach us, experiencing sports and games

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Having a library is very useful thing here to study Having a good infrastructure at campus and the plants, which gives a good energy to do some work. Timings of campus I didnot like for hostellers

Name: Ganesh Nathan
Review_Text: Road way of coming to campus takes lots of time Too high fines for wrong things made by students freedom to choose the faculty for allotted cources.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: unlimited internet facility, helps a loot. placement are good. about 98% students get placed. The hostel gates get close after 8:30 pm .

Name: Raja
Review_Text: we are not allowed to bring and food item from otside the univercity campus. not allowed to carry any electic appliances like iron ,hair dryers , electric kettle. Campus life is very good. We cam spend quality time with our friends

Name: Prashant Verma
Review_Text: Education is also good the teaching of the professors is very good. The technical fests and the hackathon events. Paper evaluation in Final Assessment Test

Name: Kreet Rout
Review_Text: Hostel atmosphere is not upto the expectation Complicated timetable. We have to run to the classes early in the morning by 8am Library had many books and it was a good place to spend time.

Name: Divyesh
Review_Text: Some faculties teaching style was really nice No gaps in between CAT exams so we had to prea]pare for it in advance Hostels were not provided during our batch

Name: Sanskriti Kumari
Review_Text: Some of the rules are too strict in this college The courses offered are great- we have aerospace, gaming, biotechnology, architecture and many more. All faculty are doctorates and well qualified to teach their respective courses.

Name: Vyom Gupta
Review_Text: The campus is pretty and green, since the college is away from the city, the air is fresh and the weather is plesant. Lack of faculty for certain courses, like mine. Being online due to construction work not being complete.

Name: SAI HARSHITH KACHAM K
Review_Text: One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech FFCS. A study who is facing difficulty to study more, can take less number of credits and it will reduce the burden of the students. And the student can also Complete the entire course in 4 years instead of 5years  by taking maximum no of credits.  ~ Supriya R Patil, B.Sc + M.Sc Campus Life in Vit is simply magnificent.All types of facilities are provided inside the campus including sport complex and restaurants.The girls to boys ratio in Mechanical engineering is surprisinly high of about 1:7.  ~ Mithilesh Angal, B.Tech

Name: Jami Gayatri Manjeera
Review_Text: I don’t like how the student and faculty ratio is 60-40  ~ Praveen Kumar, BCA Lot of exams yearly 3 exams in a semester 2-3 quiz and 1-2 DA  ~ Kartik Navnath Narare, B.Tech Water is really bad. 750+ TDS. It makes you go bald. Really.  ~ Piyush Prajapati, B.Des

Name: Shikha Saraswat
Review_Text: Diversity is what I really like here as people from different area studies here,  acadmic building Campus is beautiful as there is lot of greenery and trees and beautiful Discrimination towards north, west and east people of india.

Name: AYUSH
Review_Text: Professor should be more indulging and open towards students. I like the atmosphere here very farm from the city Food here in the food Street is very good

Name: kartik
Review_Text: Gym , ground the rockplaza here very good for enjoying You will be very far from the vijaywada . The hostel closing time here is 8.30 pm .

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Rush in here is very high at the maggi hostpot Infrastructure is the best thing in our college,u have everything Grading system is the best of all,we have relative grading rather than absolute grading

Name: Ankit Patel
Review_Text: Student friendly rules are going to be one of the point . Distance from the nearest big city vijayawada Sometimes it tough to get grades due to relative grading

Name: Aditya Raj
Review_Text: Some of the faculty are so mean that they fail the students unnecessary The sceneries in the campus are amazing at places. The Freedom to choose our own timetable for the semester

Name: adarsh
Review_Text: The food outlets in the Food Street and the taste The specific timings to play is a bit irritating There aren't much places to have fun to chill

Name: bipin
Review_Text: The location of the campus , humid at times We have so many clubs and events for extra curricular activities We have option to select our faculty and exam dates

Name: Pratap
Review_Text: We have more free space to roam and express It is far away from the city. The charges are high The food is costlier in the canteens with less quantity

Name: Kitu Raj
Review_Text: The assignments lab reports records are too worst I liked making friends and exploring with people of different culture and I am day scholars I have to travel 1hr+ everyday Thing's I disliked are travelling due to high hostel fee I can't afford hostel stat so I have to travel 1hr+ to go to college

Name: jeet
Review_Text: College atmosphere and social activities and circle Sports and Games programes along with training College events and hackathons and encouragement

Name: Kartik jigneshbhai patel
Review_Text: Firstly, the campus life is a huge applaud for the students. Then the placement percentage which is simply superb. The labs and the faculty interaction with the student

Name: Adarsh Nehra
Review_Text: Infrastructure can be built in a more effective manner Having a conjusted library makes difficult for students to study during examination The construction that is going on in the campus disturbs the students

Name: Jeet Vyas
Review_Text: Infrastructure, greenary, environment in the morning Active participation in all events, celebrations Culture activities,roap map, hostel life

Name: Himanshu jadhav
Review_Text: Tempareture changes gradually..weather conditions This college is still constructing, and the noise is so disturbing Campus life and the events like vitopia and cultural events.

Name: Rakesh Raman
Review_Text: Clubs and club activities are so much fun and give a good experience. Freedom to do things that we want to pursue. Exam papers were a bit harder than expected.

Name: ATHIRA MENON
Review_Text: The constructions at VITAP are always ongoing. The crowd at VITAP university is too much.There are so many students at VITAP that it is very hard to get on a lift with convenience. One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech

Name: Jay
Review_Text: FFCS. A study who is facing difficulty to study more, can take less number of credits and it will reduce the burden of the students. And the student can also Complete the entire course in 4 years instead of 5years  by taking maximum no of credits.  ~ Supriya R Patil, B.Sc + M.Sc Campus Life in Vit is simply magnificent.All types of facilities are provided inside the campus including sport complex and restaurants.The girls to boys ratio in Mechanical engineering is surprisinly high of about 1:7.  ~ Mithilesh Angal, B.Tech I don’t like how the student and faculty ratio is 60-40  ~ Praveen Kumar, BCA

Name: Manav chaudhary
Review_Text: Lot of exams yearly 3 exams in a semester 2-3 quiz and 1-2 DA  ~ Kartik Navnath Narare, B.Tech Water is really bad. 750+ TDS. It makes you go bald. Really.  ~ Piyush Prajapati, B.Des The friendly nature and the atmosphere and infrastructure of this campus

Name: Aditya Gupta
Review_Text: Faculty coordinators cooperation and explanation Freedom and availability of evey thing to study Nothing much but the fine they give for not wearing id card

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Outings are applicable only till Friday they should atleast make it till Saturday again When we go outing the limited time is 6hrs we need atleast from morning 9 to evening 6pm Placement is good at this campus because of a good placement officer

Name: Tejasva
Review_Text: Campus life is not good because the campus is still under construction Gender equality, food, freedom and also academics with sports We can be outside till 8:30 and can roam anywhere in campus expect the classroom and it'll be nice with friends

Name: Utkarsh Aryan
Review_Text: The curriculum for the courses will be too good for students Tough examinations sometimes. Even the ai can't give answers Some of the rod faculty who doesn't give marks even if we write answers

Name: Rakesh kumar
Review_Text: Fining for everything. Even for not being in the room while taking attendance we'll be fined of 3000 The ffcs course registration system which gives u freedom to choose your own teachers and timings The faculty members and too good, helpful, available outside the class hours

Name: Aneesh
Review_Text: The placements here are good, the average package varies like between 7-8 lakhs The university is under construction, that's the worst part Disturbing sounds because of construction

Name: Atharva Kelkar
Review_Text: The food here is not good at all, do not opt for hostels Ffcs Fully flexible credit system is good Hostels and mess food is also very nice.

Name: Atharva Kelkar
Review_Text: It has different clubs and it gives different opportunities. Hostels and academic block rules and regulations. Not all the faculty is good here in terms of strictness

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: It intakes a lot of students which creates choas. I like my campus as it is very beautiful I have marked very good friends and you can it too

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: You will get the best faculty as all of them are PhD holder I actually don't find anything which is dislike The play ground need to be developed and no stone should be there

Name: Nambiar Akhil Subhash
Review_Text: Very long classes as the length of the class is very long We can have our own time table if we are a 9 pointer Exams which are being conducted on Saturday and Sunday

Name: baazis
Review_Text: Mayuri mess' food: The food is good and hygienic. You can take as many refills as you want. The hostel rooms are clean. Cleaners come and clean the room on regular basis. Coding environment is there. I would say out of the four campuses of VIT, VIT Bhopal has the best coding environment.

Name: Samridhi Dubey
Review_Text: Wifi speed is slow. Wifi downloading speed is like 2-4 Mbps. Network issue. You will have network issue inside the hostels. Toilets and bathroom of some floors are not cleaned. Especially the last floor, the 7th floor.

Name: IBRAHIM ALI
Review_Text: Lots of places to discover , good campus life , with Boys to girls ratio under 4:1 Too many restrictions for couples around in VIT , but not for me Cos i dont have one :) Multiple food outlets are there in campus like dominos and various other centres

Name: Shikha Jain
Review_Text: Mess food is also really good and too much variety is there. Placements are great in the campus. Most of the seniors were placed Hygiene issues are there in the hostel blocks

Name: Sarvesh
Review_Text: You have to maintain 75% attendance in each course Classes are sometimes too long and boring One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech

Name: Jitendra Pal
Review_Text: FFCS. A study who is facing difficulty to study more, can take less number of credits and it will reduce the burden of the students. And the student can also Complete the entire course in 4 years instead of 5years  by taking maximum no of credits.  ~ Supriya R Patil, B.Sc + M.Sc Campus Life in Vit is simply magnificent.All types of facilities are provided inside the campus including sport complex and restaurants.The girls to boys ratio in Mechanical engineering is surprisinly high of about 1:7.  ~ Mithilesh Angal, B.Tech I don’t like how the student and faculty ratio is 60-40  ~ Praveen Kumar, BCA

Name: Lokesh Agarwal
Review_Text: Lot of exams yearly 3 exams in a semester 2-3 quiz and 1-2 DA  ~ Kartik Navnath Narare, B.Tech Water is really bad. 750+ TDS. It makes you go bald. Really.  ~ Piyush Prajapati, B.Des Frequent industrial visits in companies of different fields

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: FFCS System, students can choose there own teacher, 9 pointers get 0 percent attendance perk Brand Value, VIT is one of the prominent private engineering college in Engineering Too Crowded Campus, the ratio of teacher: students is litte bit more compared to government colleges

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Lack of sports infrastructure and costly paid sports facilities Strict environment in terms of cultural programs of North Indians. Faculties are really awersome and talented. they will help and guide through out the 4 years

Name: Vardhan ReddY
Review_Text: the lab facilites in vit chennai are just top notch The atmosphere is just so lively. you can get friends with different mindsets and can get to know a lot of people. the viteee exam algorithm is really bad.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: when your in hostel people will just constantly annoy you for fun. they will think its normal but you wont take it the way they do You have to walk a lot to go from one place to another. I like to interact with peoples of different cultures.

Name: Prakhar Prakash
Review_Text: I got n number of opportunities to explore myself I can improve my speaking skills for my benefit. 75 % attendance rule should be removed from college

Name: yashraj
Review_Text: If you are hosteller you can’t go outside everyday Strict rules are there like schools which should be removed First thing I liked is its placements. With a average package of around 13lpa it is one of the best college in terms of placements.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The Infrastructure and well equpped labs. Strict rules and strict hostel in and out timing. And they also don't allow freshers to outside the campus. So sometimes it feels like a jail. The strict 75% attendance rule. If didn't maintain 75% attendance you will be debared from the exams.

Name: Pramod Rane
Review_Text: Strictness, the college is pretty strict and so safe to send for parents The campus size is pretty large which makes the college massive Ethinic diversity is so much you will see every state

Name: Manoj patel
Review_Text: Strictness - whiles its good they limit you too mucb College intenship is not up to pae with others College placement id also not that good compared to others

Name: Madhur Agarwal
Review_Text: Curriculum of the college is top for students The food is really good. They care for our needs The events conducted helps us to gain new experience

Name: Mehakdeep Singh
Review_Text: There are more north indians in the college, which makes south Indian uncomfortable Green Campus, Proper Maintain med hostels Hostel In-Time, Library is not 24*7, Leaves are to be accepted by proctors

Name: Ravi Damor
Review_Text: If your cgpa is 9+ there is no attendence criteria for you in the collage making it worth the hardwork you put. The collage has people from all over India making it good social life experience The teachers are good and are always willing to help if theh see you putting the effort.

Name: Pooja Ramesh
Review_Text: The climate is bad here it is too warm and if you are not acclimatised to it it could make your life on the campus hard. It causes several problems with leaving you unwilling to attend college on the months of April - May. The collage is far from city. Ie there is a 30 min drive to reach it making it a far from other facilities too. No proper accommodation near college so if your are not a local you have to go for a hostel which is a tad bit expensive.

Name: Hrithik kumar singh
Review_Text: The hostels are very nice The facilities are damn nice, and the cleanliness at the hostel is quite nice. The college campus looks very well put together. The indoor gyms, swimming pool, snooker, and tennis facilities are very good tough they are paid it is worth it

Name: Himanth g
Review_Text: About my disliking the mess food could get better it takes a while to adjust with the mess food We cant leave our hostel block after 9 o'clock at night and we need to take to many permissions for a night out, the hostel blocks are very strict for that case The campus at peak times get crowded with students taking in mind the 40000 student the campus could have been bigger.

Name: Santhosh holla V M
Review_Text: The library, cricket ground, the skies and people. The weather, the crowd and the competition in here is too much One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech

Name: Hemant Kumar Kunal
Review_Text: FFCS. A study who is facing difficulty to study more, can take less number of credits and it will reduce the burden of the students. And the student can also Complete the entire course in 4 years instead of 5years  by taking maximum no of credits.  ~ Supriya R Patil, B.Sc + M.Sc Campus Life in Vit is simply magnificent.All types of facilities are provided inside the campus including sport complex and restaurants.The girls to boys ratio in Mechanical engineering is surprisinly high of about 1:7.  ~ Mithilesh Angal, B.Tech I don’t like how the student and faculty ratio is 60-40  ~ Praveen Kumar, BCA

Name: Sanjay
Review_Text: Lot of exams yearly 3 exams in a semester 2-3 quiz and 1-2 DA  ~ Kartik Navnath Narare, B.Tech Water is really bad. 750+ TDS. It makes you go bald. Really.  ~ Piyush Prajapati, B.Des Faculty are helpful.They provides all notes regularly.They gives tast to write review, journal which helps for higher studies.

Name: Samuel Chakkery
Review_Text: Every sem students have to do a new project . Students can get certificate for this. And if the paper published they gives 5k for publication. Lots companies are coming for that have a chance to get a job Lots of crowded. More than enough students are present in VIT. There is a lots of commotion.

Name: TANMAY PANDEY
Review_Text: Some of faculty not completed their syllabus. Faculty are pressurized students for Digital assessment. Recent time to get a placement are very hard. Companies coming are decreased as students ratio. I really liked the hostel life of VIT, the people I met along this journey, the campus life and the sports facility, mess food and going to the classes then hanging out with my friends around the campus also i liked going on outing with my friends.

Name: Kamal Raj
Review_Text: I really dislike the amount of unnecessary rules like the intime of hostel and the need of ID card when we go out of hostel, but still these rules have definitely helped me become more disciplined and better my ability to do work even if dislike it. I like the curriculum of the college and its teaching method. Sports facilities are also good and many tournaments are also organised by the students

Name: Soudip Dutta
Review_Text: Many events are also planned by the students. They are good enough to enjoy. Only the infrastructure of the college can be a disappoining, which is again a subjective thing varies from individual to individual. Vit campus is very huge you have to visit whole campus more than in 2 hours

Name: Sanjit Nath
Review_Text: Campus life is good i like very much my vit People are good in vit can't express how Huge crowd i thought they will not give placement

Name: Pabak Kundu
Review_Text: Placement is 100% but still i think i will get or not Crowd due to this i feel uncomfortable here The faculties are very experienced and teaches students really well.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The affordability and living cost in VIT is pretty high. Infrastructure provided like labs, classrooms etc Exposure gained here is enormous as students from all over india and abroad come here.

Name: Ashfiya Khan
Review_Text: Many Opportunities are provided i.e, internships, events etc High fees which is a very huge problem for people who wants to study but cannot afford to do so. The campus is very decent in terms of amenties.

Name: D Sree Vishnu Vardhan
Review_Text: The mess food is comparatively very good. The system of student choosing his own class timing is just awesome which this college provides you. The academic block is situated very far from the hostels.

Name: khushi
Review_Text: Hostelers are not allowed to leave campus without a long process of leave approval The sports facilities are not very good here in this college. Very friendly atmosphere and great to get along with faculty and peers

Name: Harshit
Review_Text: Classes function very smoothly and students can create their own timetables Hostel facilities exceeded my expectations. Several teachers are not familiar with the idea of the subject

Name: Abhishek Verma
Review_Text: Too many assignments given to students all at a time Location of the campus is in the middle of nowhere quality of teaching is good all faculties are doctorate

Name: Kundeti
Review_Text: campus life is pretty good, all the events are good placements, vit have a good placement record hostel here is not pretty good but only okay

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: I like the infra structure especially the Central block. It looks like a half disk cylinder The campus is covered with greenery and there are many different plants,trees, we have a pond too The educational system is very good which I got impressed by it .

Name: Aryan
Review_Text: I think there are many students than expected which makes me feel a bit congested Food in the hostels is not good , everything is limited We are not allowed to Rome around in the campus after 830 pm i don't know why but it would be better if they male it 24hr free campus.

Name: Guffran
Review_Text: One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech FFCS. A study who is facing difficulty to study more, can take less number of credits and it will reduce the burden of the students. And the student can also Complete the entire course in 4 years instead of 5years  by taking maximum no of credits.  ~ Supriya R Patil, B.Sc + M.Sc Campus Life in Vit is simply magnificent.All types of facilities are provided inside the campus including sport complex and restaurants.The girls to boys ratio in Mechanical engineering is surprisinly high of about 1:7.  ~ Mithilesh Angal, B.Tech

Name: Nilesh Anand
Review_Text: I don’t like how the student and faculty ratio is 60-40  ~ Praveen Kumar, BCA Lot of exams yearly 3 exams in a semester 2-3 quiz and 1-2 DA  ~ Kartik Navnath Narare, B.Tech Water is really bad. 750+ TDS. It makes you go bald. Really.  ~ Piyush Prajapati, B.Des

Name: Noe
Review_Text: here you can have exposure to different cultures, as all over india students come and join. so you can have friends from different states and have connections and alsoo you can learn different lanuagues and improve your english too. there will be many events unlike other colleges will have only once in a blue moon, but here, in my college you will have many events every week., from different clubs, so if you miss one event also no need to regret you will have chance always. It will be not that easy for few students to have friends because, as you dont have a constant class members and alsoo classes, you cant have fixed longlasting friendship in classes, except your roomates.

Name: RITTIKA DEB
Review_Text: you will have many acquaintances in college but not many friends who long last in your life,after college you cant say that these are my batchmates or something like that.I am npot saying about everyone. depends on individual You have to learn many things on your own and you will have group studies very less ,unless you form big groups. as you dont have a specific batch of students, you wont have memorable class times. unlike other normal engineering colleges.  College is beautiful,  campus is healthy and has a good environment.  The students are easily bonded and the faculty is also very helpful and supportive in form of marks,  studies, and attendance.

Name: Diksha Bhambri
Review_Text: The hostel service is also beautiful and comfortable,  i would like to suggest to live in hostel and live a beautiful life . The campus placement are also excellent with 90% placement record while many no. Of Student achieved the dream offers and some achieved super dream offers. Some of the faculty are lasy in teaching and some are struct in giving marks and behavior.

Name: Rituraj Patil
Review_Text: The college campus is still under construction and this a bit of worry for the students inside. The last thing is about the events and clubs which cost 250 rupees of every participating. Mess food is good and menu is decent too.

Name: Harish
Review_Text: Infrastructure is incompleted thus the college aesthetic is bad The size of campus is big so it feels good when we get out of our hostel and room here and there The quality of education the professor is very impressive

Name: Haresh Baskaran
Review_Text: The coding culture present in the colleges very good The junior senior bonding is not that much compared to other colleges The food in the mess could be better for students

Name: Gowrinath S
Review_Text: The fees here is a bit high and it could be lower Things like it's placement, teachers bonding with students. It's sports curriculum is the best till now

Name: Manas Oak
Review_Text: It's management is highly skilled in terms of library and student management. It's hectic schedule and discipline make you frustrated. Exams in regular intervals of time is make you feel pissed off

Name: Utkarsh Agarwal
Review_Text: There is no garden to just sit and make you feel peace around so ground is needed very much. Campus Life - lots of extra curricular activities Food courts - wide variety of food cuisines available

Name: Prajjwal Gupta
Review_Text: Outing restrictions - have to undergo alot of process for outing and strict with outing timings Sports amenities - limited sports amenities for such arge numbers of students Faculty was very good they focus on pratical learning

Name: waseem shaik
Review_Text: Placement rate was good.. provide good placement assistance Hostel was good.. mess was also good ... The fees was very high if we compare with our college

Name: Deva Dharshan D
Review_Text: The computer lab was having less space .. More things can be improved there like library Infrastructure and maintenance of college

Name: Paras Dang
Review_Text: Life in this college is not at all a big deal to lead Staff and Experienced graduates in college Strict timings for hostellers during evenings

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Too many restrictions in college for a student Food in mess during some particular days I liked the infrastructure and location in bhopal.

Name: Suraj Panigrahi
Review_Text: Teachers are very friendly but some are strict. food and hostel services are  very good. some teachers are very strict and it affect on marks.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: some of the facilities are very bad and slow. the college is very strict for students . One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech

Name: Prem Patel
Review_Text: FFCS. A study who is facing difficulty to study more, can take less number of credits and it will reduce the burden of the students. And the student can also Complete the entire course in 4 years instead of 5years  by taking maximum no of credits.  ~ Supriya R Patil, B.Sc + M.Sc Campus Life in Vit is simply magnificent.All types of facilities are provided inside the campus including sport complex and restaurants.The girls to boys ratio in Mechanical engineering is surprisinly high of about 1:7.  ~ Mithilesh Angal, B.Tech I don’t like how the student and faculty ratio is 60-40  ~ Praveen Kumar, BCA

Name: Lovely kumari
Review_Text: Lot of exams yearly 3 exams in a semester 2-3 quiz and 1-2 DA  ~ Kartik Navnath Narare, B.Tech Water is really bad. 750+ TDS. It makes you go bald. Really.  ~ Piyush Prajapati, B.Des Diverse Campus Life - The Campus is lively and diverse, offering a mix of cultural, technical, and sports events that make student life enjoyable and engaging.

Name: AJU PK
Review_Text: Experienced Faculty - Faculty members are knowledgeable and supportive. Their expertise contributes significantly to a robust academic environment. Placement Opportunities - VIT provides excellent placement opportunities with top companies. The strong industry connections and campus recruitment efforts enhance the employability of the students. At times, the academic workload can be intense, leading to stressful periods for students. Balancing coursework and extracurricular activities can be challenging.

Name: Vishwa Shah
Review_Text: Infrastructure Challenges - While the overall infrastructure is good, there are occasional challenges, such as crowded libraries during peak times or issues with hostel facilities. These could be areas for improvement. Limited Flexibility - Made changes these days in FFCS system where, some students may find the course structure to be relatively rigid, with limited flexibility in choosing electives. In VIT I like the greenery in campus and beautiful campus.

Name: Abhijeet giri
Review_Text: The room and washroom are good and cleaning facility is also good. The quality of food they provided is ok. They didn't allow to go out .. if we are having any work then we have to follow long procedure everytime and because of that we are many time unable to do many work.

Name: Abin Tomy
Review_Text: They are not having proper mart for everything. They are very strict in regarding everything even if anyone is shaking hand them they'll notice it and sometimes it may create problem. Very nice campus with good infrastructure

Name: Pavankalyan
Review_Text: Nice teachers as well study opputunities offered Good coding culture available and good and decent clubs engaged in various fests You cant go outside of campus in 1st semester also you can go outside after 1st sem but too much restrictions

Name: MOHAMED
Review_Text: Too much competition due to too much strength of students Academic Excellence: VIT University offers a robust curriculum, fostering academic growth. The courses are industry-aligned, ensuring students are well-prepared for real-world challenges. Campus Life: The vibrant atmosphere at VIT is captivating. With diverse clubs, events, and cultural activities, students experience a sense of community and engagement throughout their journey.

Name: Sanyam Kaushik
Review_Text: Infrastructure & Faculty: Modern infrastructure, from classrooms to labs, enhances the learning experience. Moreover, the supportive and knowledgeable faculty play a pivotal role in students' academic and personal growth. fee Structure: Some students find VIT's fee structure on the higher side, which can be a concern for those seeking affordable educational options. Crowded Classrooms: At times, the large student intake results in crowded classrooms, impacting individual attention and interactive sessions.

Name: Kuladeep
Review_Text: Limited Flexibility: Some students feel that the rigid course structure lacks flexibility in terms of elective choices and interdisciplinary learning opportunities. Excellent architecture and design of campus. Good teachings and proper lab infrastructure.

Name: DIVYA M
Review_Text: 100% placement and good average package. Unnecessary strict and little bit traditional. Some teachers just read the ppts so can't study properly.

Name: P Premnath
Review_Text: Red tag disciplinary committee. Causes unnecessary disturbance. The infrastructure of Vit is pretty good.It is a green campus and there are a lot of places where you can go sit and relax. There are a lot of fest and events happening in VIT everyday.

Name: Suriya
Review_Text: The faculties and staffs are extremely kind. There are a lot of dogs and I am personally afraid of dogs There is a huge competition in VIT.You have to hunt for opportunities

Name: Nithiya
Review_Text: The diverse range of extra curricular activities enrich my campus life at VIT Bhopal, allowing me to explore variant interest The modern infrastructure and value good classroom and optimal learning environment The approachable and qualified faculty members were supportive, adding in academic growth

Name: Preethi
Review_Text: The occasional addition, administrative delays in certain processes affected the overall efficiency Limited flexibility in elective courses, offerings constrained, academic exploration At times, the crowded nature of certain facilities impacted the ease of axis and availability for students use

Name: Kanishka Shrivastava
Review_Text: The variety of clubs the university offers to help to upskill you in every other aspect. The mess food is quite average and things could have been done to make it better The strict 75% attendance criteria sometimes limits the potential of students to focus on other projects.

Name: Gokul M
Review_Text: hostel cleaning and good facilities in the hostel very friendly and highly talented faculty the social groups we have in the instagram or whatsapp

Name: Swethaa
Review_Text: sometimes the room cleaner won't clean the properly the hostel and the colleges are very far worst part is we have to change class for every for every period like 45minutes

Name: Shanmugapriya
Review_Text: I like the coding culture that is in my college is excellent. The event like hackathon conducted in gravitas, and other events is always give new experience which help in developing new skills also. There in no ragging in my college. Senior are very helpful here .

Name: Reshma Antony
Review_Text: Taking lots of students in my course is cons for us as because of too much of crowd competition for getting placement is very high. The rule and regulations are quiet strictly as after 9 pm no one is allowed To go to other block. Category wise fee system is not good. There must be same feee for everyone m
