Name: Afreen zehra
Review_Text: The diversity of the culture among the students and the wide variety of ideas . The hostel are much better than some big colleges. There should be more coding culture for students.

Name: Praveenkumar
Review_Text: There should some improvement in curriculum. College campus is good environment is good College crowd is the thing i dont like also the load of assignments

Name: ZUBIN JAMES KRISHNENDU PALIT
Review_Text: I like in college campus is beauty of campus . Also Like make a new friend in campus and interact new people.  Campus life is very good. Grab Knowledge everyday.  Faculty is excellent and placement average is 5 LPA.

Name: Sayantan Pal
Review_Text: Disliked fake students mostly, not good all for me  Infrastructure is down compare to MIT .Time Table is not good my class.  Sometimes guard not working properly and

Name: prince
Review_Text: Campus is greenary and good  which gives good atmosphere Population is little high but overall which is very good campus and placement  life Study in classes and          coordination among students and faculty.

Name: Manliness
Review_Text: Nice places and well defined gyms and other facilities. Food street and rock plaza are very good for spending time and money to have delicious food. Nothing more        but having  my best friend and buddy here          .

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Queue near mess during afternoon as all the students are coming at a time to dine. Missing clothes rarely while giving them to laundry. VIT Vellore is known for its state-of-the-art infrastructure, including modern classrooms, well-equipped laboratories, and advanced research facilities. The campus is designed to provide a conducive environment for academic and exc activities

Name: Sarthak Shrivastava
Review_Text: The university is reputed for its academic excellence and offers a wide range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs across various disciplines. It often attracts students who are looking for quality education and a strong academic curriculum. The university emphasizes research and innovation, providing students with opportunities to engage in meaningful research projects. This can be appealing to those who are interested in contributing to advancements in their respective fields. Some students may find that large class sizes can limit personal interaction with professors and hinder a more intimate learning experience.

Name: shirish
Review_Text: Students might express dissatisfaction with a curriculum that they perceive as too rigid, especially if they are interested in interdisciplinary studies or if there is limited flexibility in choosing elective courses. n some cases, students may feel that there is a lack of diversity among faculty members, both in terms of backgrounds and perspectives. Campus Life is very nice and beautiful! People go for walks and hang out with friends in the evening.

Name: UMA SHANKAR V
Review_Text: Education as professors prefer Research based studies leading to enhanced quality learning. We need to get inside the Hostel Premises (if a Hosteller) by 9 pm. I like the supporting staff and faculty, whom you can approach during any time of the day. Most of them will stand by you, and help with difficult concepts and clarify any doubts

Name: Usha
Review_Text: The college also boasts state of the art facilities like a massive library and multiple labs for each subject. The campus is also lush in green, and is very welcoming. The teachers help you publish papers and take up projects which help you gain experience, interest and knowledge for the subject. I dislike the strict adherance to attendance policies and in time for hostellers

Name: Sudhanshu Kumar
Review_Text: I dislike the fact that they frown upon boys and girls sitting and having a chat with each other. The FFCS structure they provide for exams The brand value VIT gets on the table is unmatched

Name: Anuba B
Review_Text: Construction phase is going onn in 2023. Strict hostel rules, entry exit restrictions, Proctor assigned. Strict campus and academic rules that you need to follow at any cost

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Fun and engaging courses : Interesting curriculum. Supportive faculties : Smart and friendly faculty. Job prospects : Good placement opportunities.

Name: Guru Prashanth J
Review_Text: Slow repairs : sometimes maintenance takes time. Communication  gaps : Information flow could improve. Limited resources : Adequate but scope for enhancement.

Review_Text: I like the supporting staff and faculty, whom you can approach during any time of the day. Most of them will stand by you, and help with difficult concepts and clarify any doubts. The teachers help you publish papers and take up projects which help you gain experience, interest and knowledge for the subject.

The extra cirricular activities and the opportunities to study for the different colleges outside the country.

Name: Bhanu Praneeth Ramayanam
Review_Text: The placement of the college is good and most of the people get placed in college. Campus is big and very green so this we fell fresh in the campus. The overburden of studies and the curriculum is strict.

Name: Divas Dagur
Review_Text: Some teachers are partial towards some students . Due to intake of so many students during each year the college is over crowded. Environment of the college every one is so good to me and there are many other faculty who were like parent to me there are collage student also need me so help them as well the are too good for like me to help them but I like the most is the pi meet

Name: Sakshi Tandon
Review_Text: I most likely say the food is also good full in the area there non other than to collage cafeteria s food There are several of the wifi chamber in library to study and do what you want. The behaviour of some of the faculty and there more often some specific person too

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The exam timing that date schedule timing of college The response time of dws of our college is also very bad The Infrastructure is decent given the college is situated in a remote city.

Review_Text: The placements are great considering recession is going on. Faculties are not upto the mark. There are several faculties teaching outdated things from their course. Administration is poor. They make several decisions without planning

Name: Harish kumar
Review_Text: Curriculum is made in such a way that student did not find any difficulty in skill development Campus Life is good had good diversity overall development is good Faculties are good at their domain knowledge

Review_Text: some faculties are rude and don't like to help students canteen is very expensive and have very limited options I like the flexiblity of choosing my own faculties and time slots to study.

Review_Text: I like how the enviornment push us to give our best here at VIT. Restrictions and rules are one thing which I dont like. Mess food and taste can be improved and can be much better.

Review_Text: Cleanliness around the campus makes you feel comfortable. Wifi speed is very poor. Even if they fix it, against the speed becomes poor. No proper ground for football or cricket.

Name: Darshan Darak
Review_Text: I like the course structure and faculty behavior I like the placement cell which will help you through out the programe I really do not like the hostels and hostel life

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Nice Placement Opportunities, nice attempt to remove intermixing of boys and girls . You can Schedule your own personalized timetable. Nice Infrastructure for to provide educational environment.

Name: Mugilan
Review_Text: Too much distance of the academic block from the hostel . No aligned time table with the hostel and classes. No Opportunities to persue a carrier in Sporting field.

Name: AVIRAL SRIVASTAVA
Review_Text: i liked the envirnoment in this collage its very competative. vitb has very googd envirnomment for studey and very good envirnoment for exploring by own i love the technique to teaching the subjects also the supportive faculties

Name: Ainish Vadhwani
Review_Text: Course Curriculum - the program in CSE provided a solid foundation in computer science principles and equipped me with the skills and knowledge  Faculty - The faculty members were highly qualified , experienced and passionate Strict Rules - the university is enforced to strict rules and regulation

Name: Shyam
Review_Text: Fees Hike the annual fees hikes added to the financial burden for students Placements , is good as per seniors statement Campus is lush green and clean , environment friendly

Name: Shivam
Review_Text: Anti ragging community , their is strictly no ragging allowed in campus Their is fine for everything., too much guards are their everywhere Campu6 is in developing State , so that's why it is very small,

Review_Text: You have to take leave or outing every time you want to go outside the campus , which is a lengthy process. The college infrastructure and laboratories The ethnicity and variety of people we meet

Specialization: Computer Science and Engineering + Data Science
Review_Text: Hostel food and the hygiene of the toilets The weather is extremely hot and attending classes during afternoon is a serious challenge College intake is more than what the infrastructure can handle

Name: Gaurav Sahu
Review_Text: Robust Placement OpportunitiesSupportive Campus InfrastructureDiverse Range of Student ClubsApproachable and Knowledgeable Faculty Limited Recreational FacilitiesOccasional Administrative DelaysLack of Transparency in Fee Policies In one class minimum students is 70 so teacher give attention to all

Name: Chirag Kumar Banka
Review_Text: Hostels Wi-Fi speed is not good at all and no network tower inside the room I love the food that is served in the food street and in rock plaza. We can happily timepass in the leisure time. Hostels are very clean and hygienic. Students may remain healthy.

Name: CHANDRASEKHAR
Review_Text: The infrastructure of the campus is very good. I have toilets in the hostel they are very stinky and littered all over the toilet. The ground is too small to play so I didn’t liked as well.

Review_Text: Behaviour of security guards I hate them because they show attitude. Name: Yashwardhan Singh
Review_Text: Having a library and available faculty in college We had some under construction part of college and hostles We will face some what food issues at any part of the week

Name: Siddharth Thakur
Review_Text: Absence of library in some non instructional days Great research opportunities with good PhD facilities to help you in your research. Great alumni network which will help you in future for your overall placements.

Name: Yatharth Srivastava
Review_Text: Huge competition which gets you to study more and Excel in every aspect of life. The huge crowd of Vit which affects the placement stats .Also due to too much student intake,it gets hard to get placed in a very good company The startup culture of Vit is not that great and Vit doesn't encourage you enough to start your own startup.

Name: Tanushree T K
Review_Text: The education system of Vit is very rigid.A minimum of 75 percent attendance is mandatory and you will get debarred if you don't maintain it.Debar exemption is only provided if you have a hospital discharge summary. each department at vit bhopal holds 100 percentage daoctorate faculty strict rules and regulation ,make a good environment

Name: Karan Tak
Review_Text: vit bhopal is really good for computer science and eng. every person i talk to just says it's not good There is a sub too of vit bhopal university

Review_Text: there too people were complainning but later i got in contact with some other Campus life food hostels peer group and clubs Studies amd curriculum the facilities in labs

Review_Text: Attendance policy and strict hostel timings There are a  lot of extra curricular activities that you can participate in College a provides support for anything related to technology if you are interested

Name: Bhuvana Ganess

Review_Text: Availability of food stalls and market for daily use 1st semester students are not allowed outing Sometimes it feels like its too crowded, specially in lift

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Some teachers are not that good and cut extra marks Academic Excellence: The institution maintained a high standard of academic rigor, providing a comprehensive and updated curriculum. Faculty Expertise: The faculty members were knowledgeable, experienced, and accessible, contributing significantly to the learning experience.

Name: Nitish
Review_Text: Campus Infrastructure: State-of-the-art facilities, modern classrooms, well-equipped labs, and a sprawling campus enhanced the overall academic environment. Fees: While the education quality was high, the fees were relatively steep, posing a challenge for some students. Limited Hostel Space: Securing hostel accommodation was competitive due to limited spaces, leading some students to opt for off-campus housing.

Name: Arijit Das
Review_Text: Rigidity in Curriculum: Some found the curriculum to be slightly rigid, with limited flexibility in choosing electives. The campus is big and great to spend time in. Social life is good and there are designated hangout spots

Name: Aditya
Review_Text: The grounds are well maintained and green There are strict curfews in place such as hostel in time at 9:00 pm and main gate food delivery by 7:00 Some archaic rules and regulations in place discouraging contact between boys and girls

Review_Text: Students can freely roaming their blocks and they can enjoy their life happly If we came to studies part it is very good opportunity to utilize in vit.  Those who want to achieve their ambition apart from studies the vit gate is always open to encourage them

Review_Text: The security system is very very strict in vit.  The celebration in Foodys timing is very rare and student disappointed in that.  Thes studenta feels very bad to go to bustop in main gate

Review_Text: Teaching Faculty- they help students in every way possible regarding any subject related queries Infrastructure- Vit chennai has a campus of 197 green campus with tall buildings and clean and green Labs - the lab facilities provided at Vit chennai are the best and have every equipment required .

Review_Text: Strict Hostel rules-Their are strict in timings after which students cannot go out in the campus for   boys 9 P.M and for girls it is 8P.M which is sometimes very early as compared to other colleges and wifi and Ac are for limited hours only Strict Dress codes for girls and boys and are fined if they are not according to the warden Less freedom for students especially girls especially because of their too strict in timing and dress code

Review_Text: The vice faculty of vit chennai is good . Opportunities in final placements and clubs Campus infrastructure and parking for students

Name: Anonymous

Review_Text: distance from the main city like Bhopal, Sehore etc. Meagre holidays are provided and vacations are really less VIT Chennai is a leading private university in India, known for its academic excellence and strong research focus. Name: Mandavi Pandey
Review_Text: VIT Chennai has a vibrant student life with a variety of clubs and organizations to cater to a wide range of interests. The university also hosts a number of cultural and technical events throughout the year. VIT Chennai has a strong record of placements. The university has a dedicated placement cell that works closely with industry to connect students with potential employers. VIT Chennai graduates are highly sought-after by top companies in India and ab VIT Chennai has a strict set of rules and regulations that some students find to be overly restrictive. These rules can cover everything from dress code to curfew to social interactions. Some students feel that these rules stifle their freedom and in

Review_Text: Cleanliness. They have a well maintained toilets and support staff almost always mop the floors. Placements are great for UG and PG students. Having to walk around the huge campus is so tiring.

Name: Akshit
Review_Text: Would be great if we have an information system about all the available computing facilities. For people from interior of Chennai, it is hard to reach college, and the college bus and hostel are a bit pricy. The environment is good the university is good for learning and developing your skills

Name: Vanieka
Review_Text: The placements are very good as every year many students get placed The faculties here are good they teach very passionatetely Hostels are not that good the food in the hostel are not good

Name: Soumya Rajadhyaksha
Review_Text: The rules of the university and hostels are very strict As the campus is very far from the City so it is very difficult toh get anything I liked the sports department and the library the most

Name: Aiswarya
Review_Text: The gazebo is a place u can go to chill with friends Hostel food is not that bad actually its good if u compare with others. Hostel in timings of both boys and girls

Name: Krishna Basak
Review_Text: In timings of the university it self is too soon. Red tag people and guards annoy a lot sometimes Competitive Environment  which compels me to put nothing less than 100%

Name: Juhi Shaw
Review_Text: There are a lot of extra co curricular activities that allow for a holistic development letting you take the  feels of a good college life There are some of the best Faculties one can ask for . There expanse of knowledge as well as patience while clearing doubts is immaculate Medical facilities are decent enough however outbreak management needs improvement

Name: Adeeba Rashid
Review_Text: During the summers or rain , the path ways though provided with shed ; put up a good deal of extra effort especially when you are rushing to college College life is very good , there are friends to talk with, not that much strict. Here all the teachings are done using computer , so the usage of notebook is less.

Name: Rahul Raj Pandey
Review_Text: The facultys are nice, they provide us with ffcs which means we can select our own faculties and timings. Every program costs us money. It is very expensive. The outing timing and going for leave is a heavy procedure.

Name: Suren. V
Review_Text: The hostel is very strict , we can't even go to our friends room after 10pm. Their building, thier mess , selection of faculty by students Good hostel room , clean bathroom and emergency doctor availablity

Name: Gaurav. G
Review_Text: Large campus , good canteens , they try to give little practical experience Early hostel entry , bad campus life and nothing to do Distance between hostel to academic block is about1.6 km.

Name: Rahul kumar
Review_Text: Sometimes bad behaviour of faculty and even management Safe place,  no tension to parent's about the safety of their kids Students are placed anyhow, but get placement in an average good package

Name: Sanjeet. V
Review_Text: Guards are very roughly speaking people, they sound rude and aggressive Girls boys are seen in a very different way, it makes us uncomfortable to walk with male friends Outings are very less hours. Girls dont have freedom.

Name: Pranab sai
Review_Text: Rivera and gravitas Rivera is the biggest faced in our college. There come celebrities like Armaan Malik. Greenhouse in every week, there is one event dance, music, drama. Food fit facilities in campus. Food was really nice and all types of food is.

Name: Nishit kumavat
Review_Text: A fat exam fat exam is most of tough exam. Rules for the girls is not likeable in timing is seven for the main gate And they are giving not that much holidays

Name: Nikhil. L
Review_Text: One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech FFCS. A study who is facing difficulty to study more, can take less number of credits and it will reduce the burden of the students. And the student can also Complete the entire course in 4 years instead of 5years  by taking maximum no of credits.  ~ Supriya R Patil, B.Sc + M.Sc Campus Life in Vit is simply magnificent.All types of facilities are provided inside the campus including sport complex and restaurants.The girls to boys ratio in Mechanical engineering is surprisinly high of about 1:7.  ~ Mithilesh Angal, B.Tech

Name: Pradeep sharma
Review_Text: I don’t like how the student and faculty ratio is 60-40  ~ Praveen Kumar, BCA Lot of exams yearly 3 exams in a semester 2-3 quiz and 1-2 DA  ~ Kartik Navnath Narare, B.Tech Water is really bad. 750+ TDS. It makes you go bald. Really.  ~ Piyush Prajapati, B.Des

Name: G.Preethi Lahari
Review_Text: i liked the way of teaching of teachers . i enjoy a lot while playing sports with my friends . overall consideration my campus life is so good in all aspects.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: there is no such things that disliked but climate is too bad mainly the food is average not as i expected . there is no ac in classes due to hot conditions it is very difficult to listen classes

Name: Malvika Singh
Review_Text: The campus is huge and there are alot of facilities like badminton courts, tennis courts, basketball courts, gyms, swimming pools, and stadium with 400meters track. The campus life is amazing as there are a lot of activities going on at any particular period of time. We can choose our timings of the class and faculty. So I prefer evening classes so that I don't need to wake up early.

Name: Nishanth. K
Review_Text: Hostel registration process depends on your rank which is not good as toppers have preference. The number of student is a lot as there are around 35,000 students which is a lot. It is crowded. There is timings that you can't come out of hostel after 9 pm. And should come inside campus by 8: 30 pm.

Name: Manikanta
Review_Text: Campus infrastructure, Placements, Clubs, near to the city Friendly teaching Faculties, hostel, Good lab technologies Distance from college to hostel and hostel to college

Name: Praveen solanki
Review_Text: Washrooms must be maintained well and cleaned well Over crowded population and Very hot whether in Vellore Experiential learning program (was basically a vacation).

Name: Vijay. B
Review_Text: Great ECE faculty however there are quite some supportive faculties in other branches too. Amazing and inspirational company could be found since theres too many people. Hostel rooms are small. It gets inconvennient.

Name: V. Prasad
Review_Text: Too many restrictions on girls can be very frustrating. Strict on the most useless things which wont ever affevt you in your lifetime. Friendly Environment, studious atmosphere, safe, strict.

Name: Vaishnavi S
Review_Text: faculty are awesome, friendly, sincere, helpful. overall experience so far is good, campus life is good, hostel are nice. Campus is under-construction, little over-crowded in mess.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The campus aminities is very good and very peaceful The culturals which they are conducting is very well organized and very good we can speak and mingle with other state students

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Campus is very crowd nowadays. Students are also getting some People in my collage connect each other fastly so that it makes us improve network we get chance to participate in many events like hackathons and many more events in 1st uear itself

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: opurtunities provided by college like we can  represent our college in some event s mess food(block1) one day it would be nice one one day cant even eat distance b/w boys and academic block is 1.7km for girls and AB is only 1km (partiality)

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: strictnesss like one day couples got fined for kissing in Under belly(food court) The flexibility of choosing your own timetable and faculties. The campus is huge with all major amenities.

Name: indra.d
Review_Text: Placement is 100% and with decent packages Some subjects aren't provided in semesters and you need to wait until they provide them in later semesters The wifi automatically disconnects after 12:30 in night

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: If you get a backlog in a subject, you need to redo the subject in next semester again after paying 6000 instead of simply giving the exam again later Connection you get to make with so many different people Good infrastructure and talented faculties

Name: praveen rao
Review_Text: The opportunities provided by the college to enrich each students knowledge and experience Affordability and the living cost at the college The drug abuse among students and the locals

Review_Text: Things about i like this collage is good and competitive environment. The things like about is you will enjoy good campus life. Other things that i like is centralised placements.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The things i dislike about this collage is they don't have proper single playground. The other thing i dislike about this collage is we cannot go outside from our hostel after 8 pm within in  campus also. The one thing is that every thing that you purchase is very costly.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The campus is very big , so here the life is good. Here the library is very good , all things are available inside the campus. You can choose your faculty and design your own timetable.

Name: Uday Bhaskar
Review_Text: We have to walk more to reach our classroom. Since the campusis big , we gotta walk a lot Mess food won't be good sometimes. Things are expensive  inside the campus

Review_Text: First of all campus is very good having best infrastructure. It is green campus with lot of trees. And I like about the teachers. Most of the teachers are friendly Big campus some times you need to travel more fistance

Review_Text: Crowd, Food, Strictness, Dorm conditions. Sports facility and freedom gave by vit and joyfull environment. Clubs fests and events are very good and enjoyable.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Daily there will be events and good faculties. Tough question paper in exams and strict correction. Some of the unwanted rules in hostel blocks.

Name: Yashi Srivastava
Review_Text: The curriculum is good and provides a great aspect of subjects The campus is beautiful and you can enjoy your walk in the campus There are lost of stalls of food and othet facilities

Name: Shravani
Review_Text: The strictness of the timings one should be in hostels by 9pm sharp The 75 percentage attendance criteria is not good The fees of the institute is a liitle on higher side

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: 1. Academics - They are really good in terms of curriculum. 2. Discipline - The discipline overall is very good in this college. You won't find people smoking and drinking around the campus. Drugs are almost nil and the crowd overall is pretty good. 3. Hostels and accommodation - Though they struggle to accomodate all the crowd at a time in the college but their premium hostels and food quality is genuinely good.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Campus Life : Lots of restrictions and PDA gaurds. Infrastructure: Campus is still in construction. Sometimes they don't even have hostels for the accomodation. Sports facilities: cricket and football really needs to be improved.

Name: DIVYANSH JAIN
Review_Text: The college looks awesome, has many greeneries everywhere. Very well maintained building, roads,etc. Classroom and Laboratory facilities are very good. Very well designed. Many Faculties teaches very well and very much understandable.

Name: Shaurya Kohli
Review_Text: The distance from the Hostel blocks to the academic blocks is a bit far, so we take long time to reach the Academic blocks. Some faculties doesn't teach well, they just show their PDF's and leave the class. Too much assignments are meant to be completed within a short span of time , and in that time we also have examinations. Less time is available to complete the Assignments.

Name: Chinmaye
Review_Text: Greenery, hostels, the people, the weather The crowd, the heat sometimes, mess food sometimez Social life and interaction with other students is really helpful and promotes character development as an individual.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The infrastructure is absolutely excellent The employees are really friendly and help you out with any issue that you face and this is really nice of them There is not much freedom because students are not allowed to go outside the college campus for more than a specified amount of time

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The accomodation and food is based on the cgpa score from the exams Very hectic and tight schedule with very strict timings and rules. Review_Text: The campus itself is good but there are too many restrictions. The faculty is good but sometimes you get not so good faculties too. The campus and infrastructure and the environment.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Books are not provided we have to borrow from library. Diversity of people since admissions are done on the basis of entrance examination Hostel quality is nice. Staff housing is the best.

Name: Anonymous

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The placements are astonishingly better than expected. All faculties are confident about placements in 1st class onwards only. There are frequent power cuts in the hostel.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Due to the construction work there are disturbance sometimes. The campus offers a vibrant student life with clubs, cultural events, and sports activities The internet connection can be a problem many times because of the location of college

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The infrastructure , the Lab facilities and the overall atmosphere. The cultural and technical fests of VIT and also the importance that it gives to extra curricular activities along with studies. The opportunities that it offers in terms of student exchange programs and internships.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The fact that the lake in VIT is closed for students. The fact that the bus systems charge fares for very short distances. The over-hyped prices of the auto annas for very short distances.

Review_Text: The packages at the last of our college are good I didnt like the allowance for the outside permission I think the timings should be more loose

Name: Leela Krishna Sai
Review_Text: The lectures should be more convinient and should he more friendly to us First of all I liked the Infrastructure that is provide in our campus. There is a friendly atmosphere in the campus,there is no sign of any ragging ar any bullying in the campus.

Name: Chebolu Bhanu Nandini
Review_Text: The campus placements and the job opportunities are much better in this college compared to other's. The question papers has to be set based upon the every student perspective. There should be some shortage of assigning works for the students during the time of examination,so they can concentrate more on the exam.

Name: Anonymous
Specialization: Computer Science and Engineering + Data Science
Review_Text: The hostels and the meal can be maintained much better and can be served well. Campus Life is pretty good. Infrastructure is really amazing. Huge buildings surrounded by forests, what more could I ask for.

Name: Ridhika Sahni
Review_Text: The faculty is also softspoken and feel good to me Nothing in particular altho I don't know if placements are going to be as good as advertised. Study, faculty, cleanliness maintanence, club activitys

Name: Eshan Madnani
Review_Text: Some faculty and some times food and sometimes network I love my friends and faculty at our college. Innovation of new things by our college students best example is prepinsta

Name: Arsh mand
Review_Text: physical aminities and ground canteen,classrooms,auditoriums,room ,library,greenary the sports facilities are good.the faculty is very helpful.If you study well you will get a good placement.They good infrastructure. They have basketball courts football ground badminton court indoor gym  I liked the people as the people are good and comfortable and lovely among others

Name: Nehal aswani
Review_Text: Their is no thing I disliked I loves all the things here Greenary and infrastructure of the campus is awesome. One in their free time can make their friends gang and rome around the campus  We have to pay money in order to access gyms, Indoor stadium, swimming pool

Name: Mohit Singh Bisht
Review_Text: Strict curriculum and interesting studies. Very good hostels offered as they are new. Anti ragging campus and strict environment in matter of ragging.

Name: Zara Iqbal
Review_Text: The restrictions laid on students in the campus No outing for first year students and lots of formalities Lack of sports opportunities and lack of area for playing.

Name: Vikash Kumar
Review_Text: the infrastructure of vit ap university is great. The faculty is really great and friendly. the mode of commutation from hostel rooms to academic blocks

Name: Aayush Pandey
Review_Text: One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech FFCS. A study who is facing difficulty to study more, can take less number of credits and it will reduce the burden of the students. And the student can also Complete the entire course in 4 years instead of 5years  by taking maximum no of credits.  ~ Supriya R Patil, B.Sc + M.Sc Campus Life in Vit is simply magnificent.All types of facilities are provided inside the campus including sport complex and restaurants.The girls to boys ratio in Mechanical engineering is surprisinly high of about 1:7.  ~ Mithilesh Angal, B.Tech

Name: mukesh pathak
Review_Text: I don’t like how the student and faculty ratio is 60-40  ~ Praveen Kumar, BCA Lot of exams yearly 3 exams in a semester 2-3 quiz and 1-2 DA  ~ Kartik Navnath Narare, B.Tech Water is really bad. 750+ TDS. It makes you go bald. Really.  ~ Piyush Prajapati, B.Des

Name: Pranav Warrier
Review_Text: Faculty of vit ap university are really great and friendly. The infrastructure and the amenities provided. The mode of commutation frim hostel rooms to the academic blocks.

Name: Shreyansh Satapathy
Review_Text: The quality of the food and taste of the is decent here and it  hygienic. The sports facilities which are available to us are excellent and variety of sports facilities are available here. The availability of books and generals through online portal has impressed me a lot.

Name: Chimata Shriya
Review_Text: The curfew timing here is 8.30pm which is very early. The commodities here are overpriced compared to the market price. Some teachers here fails to explain most basic concepts they are confused by there own slides.

Name: Sumit Prakash
Review_Text: The amount of area they provide and the facilities with the academics they provide We are given sports facilities like table tennis rooms badminton fourts football and cricket ground and many more Food here tastes decent and is hygienic and is maintained properly

Name: Ishaan agarwal
Review_Text: The curfew time is very early we have to get in by 8.30 pm The price of normal commodities are higher than the original market price Some Teachers here cant explain things and get confused by their own question

Name: SURESH
Review_Text: Infrastructure is good , environment is good and that's it . There isn't any kind of safety issues in this campus , security is tight . Of course girls are beautiful here and everyone wants to get a partner here .

Name: P.Pariha parvaze
Review_Text: Despite being beautiful, girls are girls they won't choose a good guy so rest assured . Water for daily use is a partially purified hard water . It is yellow in colour yess it is yellow . Reporting time of hostels is 8:30 which is so not fair .

Name: Mohith J
Review_Text: Aerospace course is doing great and one of the best in india Campus is expanding very fast construction is done 24*7 Management is really poor and doesn't stands with the reputation of vit college

Name: Bhavyasree.C
Review_Text: Intake is around 6k for vit bhopal this year Placment majority Students are placed in mass recruiting company Quality of Faculty: The quality of faculty members and their teaching methods are often pivotal in determining students' satisfaction

Name: Ashlin
Review_Text: Campus Infrastructure: Many students appreciate modern infrastructure and state-of-the-art facilities Placement Opportunities: A strong track record of campus placements and access to a wide range of job opportunities Fees and Expenses: The cost of education, including tuition and living expenses, can sometimes be a concern for students and their families.

Name: Pooja
Review_Text: Course Load and Pressure: Some students may find the academic workload and pressure to perform challenging. Peoples and cultures are good it would be more easier to get friends from different states The facilities are quite good such as sports, fests, gym Etc

Name: Shivansh gupta
Review_Text: There would be language barrier with other students who are from different states i like we have more tech fests actually we for every week We no need to attend to cclass if we have 9.0 cgpa

Name: Pradeep
Review_Text: FFCC system makes  esahy for the student to create their own time table relative grading for calculating cgpa looks fair infrastructure is good with big classrooms

Name: shubham vasishta
Review_Text: restrictions for some items in hostel is something i didnt like timings because somedays classes are till 7:30 mess food is repeated same thing every week

Name: Ms dhoni
Review_Text: As compared to vellore it is a new campus but still you will have a wonderful experience with the campus life, they will provide their best accordingly faculty is also good and if you face difficulty you can choose your faculty by yourself which is a plus point. placement and infrastructure is really impressive, if you are putting effort on yourself then I might be sure that you will surely get placed in a good company hope you find this review helpful.

Name: HARSH AGARWAL
Review_Text: Mess food isn't that great but yes you will survive by eating this food as it a new campus their is not much to do outside the hostels and they are some kind of too strict so you can't even hang in the campus after 8:30 pm nowadays who doesn't like cheap things so basically there is a place c called food street in the campus which is a bit expensive

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Infrastructure of college, sports facilities, computer labs are the best Campus is far from the city which makes difficult for outing High security for girls and boys which leads to restricted friendships

Name: Anjali
Review_Text: The Infrastructure of the college and classrooms. The Hostel rooms and the mess are clean and hygienic. The faculty provided are really great and are highly qualified for the role.

Name: Ayush Poonia
Review_Text: The mode of commutation from the hostel rooms to the campus. Environment of the campus is very nice and clean. A bit of strictness is necessary for easy process which is there isn the campus.

Name: Kshitij Jain
Review_Text: Guards and helpers are always available for us to help us in everything. Faculty is not choosen by the students in 1st semester so we have to adjust firstly. Mess food is mostly south indian which makes it problem for north indians.

Name: Daksh
Review_Text: the environment, the freedom to expand your knowledge the opportunities to participate in various events. the faculties effort and teaching style.

Name: Ananya Yayavaram
Review_Text: The strict rules that no body can leave their respective hostels after 9pm. Campus structure and environment is beautiful. Resolving problems and issues is excellent

Name: Rajeev Shukla
Review_Text: Mess food are good and healthy for stomach  Classrooms needs improvement according to the weather conditions here. Lack of fan and ac in mess and classrooms

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Sports equipment needs improvement and need more quantity  The environment of the campus is quite good you have provided with each and every facilities you don't have to go to other places in search of the facility in hostel also you will get every kind of thing the mess is quite decent the manual change eve The transportation facilities quite bad the colleges set in a remote areas so you have to take some Kaif facility to get to the railway station of the airport apart from that man restrictions in outing you only will be a lot to go to the you are only

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Campus is good and people are cooperative Hostel rooms and mess food is the highlight of my day Classroom and faculties are equipped to lead us

Name: Priya Jain
Review_Text: People are nice and friendly...no ragging The In timing.....8:30 u should be inside your hostel blocks. Library close really early like 6:30 on regular day

Review_Text: College is in out location so faces problem in transportation and availability of goods Campus Culture, Hostel Facilities, Students The fact that the college accepts students through management quota

Name: Vaishnavi
Review_Text: Campus environment is nice. Big Campus - The entire area is around 200 acres Good Faculty- Most faculties here are Doctorate

Name: Jeevan varma
Review_Text: Too many students which increases competition The campus is in the rural outskirts of Vijayawada. Friendly staff and  seniors. Pretty good professors

Name: Rahul
Review_Text: Small campus, number of insects, repitetive menu and curfew timings for sports at 7:30 and hostel at 8:30 Faculty are good and tend to help all students. Campus is quite green and clean including hostel and classrooms.

Name: Nikhil
Review_Text: Campus life is good and offers good opportunities to all the students to excel. Hostels tend to close early at night and dont allow students to go out after that. The canteens close at 9PM making it difficult to get something to eat late night

Name: Mrigank Mishra
Review_Text: I liked the labs as they are fully equipped with modern favilities and ac. I liked the good stalls as there are bariety of foods available. I like the fests as they are filled with fun.

Name: Venkatesh
Review_Text: I dislike the behavioud of the guards and faculty when they see opposite gender talking. Ffcs is system is not gud at all . It shous be eual for everyone. Faculty members are well qualified and help out a lot in times of doubt

Name: Rakesh
Review_Text: Social and campus life is lively and the people are nice and approachable The mess food can get repetitive and the menu items are made a bit too spicy The food street items are quite expensive and there are no shops nearby outside the campus

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Every classroom isn't equipped with an AC but some are which feels wrong It is goodand atmosphere and surrounding of clg is very peaceful  All the college i liked very well and facilities are good

Name: Swastika Das
Review_Text: The clg overall is very good and fests woll ne conducted during festivals  Very strict and we cant go outside and the buses are taking long time  In canteen food is very bad management want to change the canteen

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: In any process we want to wait it has more waiting time to complete our work  I like the curricullum of vit bhopal , which is very effective . professor behaviour with the student are also very decent

Name: Sonu Jha
Review_Text: placement cell are very active , around 900 companies visit every year for placement . over crowdwd campus , around 20000 student in the campus across all branch . campus are much away from the city bhopal , around 70km .

Name: Saurav Raj
Review_Text: attendence policy , 75% attendence is compulsory . One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech FFCS. Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Placement are too good, and very good companies hire our college. I think fee in our college is bit more. Here the way maintenance of college I liked and the students are very fastly becoming friends and lecturers are also very good while teaching

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Sports are nice to play here which sport do you like that one you can play The construction of the college is no nice Nothing I disliked in the college everything is nice

Name: Sankalp Dayal
Review_Text: Nothing i disliked in this college everything is nice Campus life is good you can make few more friends Sports and extra curricular activities are good

Name: Ahona saha
Review_Text: Overall facilities are good, lab equipments are well maintained, students can use for their projects Rushing through everything, time management is must, students want to enjoy but have to work over time on assignments depends on faculty Recent freshers intake is more so the campus is more crowded

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Good classroos which are spacious, it can accomodate the large population in the campus The campus is very spacious with a lot of greenery and a lot of fast food places The faculty are well read and are always open to helping u work with them

Name: Kashish
Review_Text: The time tables are a bit restrictive and can be made more flexible Campus life, infrastructure of the buildings Mess food quality is not that good

Name: Subhrajit Hoom
Review_Text: You can meet a lot of friends because there's a lot of shuffling and you can form groups to get friends together in a class every semester. Staff or Teaching problems, some of them felt like not worth it. we can borrow any sports equipment that we like to play with during our free time at no additional cost.

Name: Harsh singh
Review_Text: College bus timings do not correspond with class timings well enough. I like the campus beacuse there is lot of greenery and chillout places Campus life is quite good and infrastructure is also fine.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: cultural fests and the events happened regularly at campus, we have open mics where people showcase their talents the library is fully air conditioned and has a lot books related to my course the college food canteen is pretty good it offers wide variety of food

Review_Text: the black listed faculties who award very poor marks I like more faculty on our college and i like clubs. I like collage surroundings and all the workers.

Review_Text: Water is really bad. 750+ TDS. It makes you go bald. Really.  ~ Piyush Prajapati, B.Des we can choose our class timings and slots. campus is huge and partially filled with greenery

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: infrastructure is good with new buildings upcoming in campus. As intake is huge almost everywhere there are crowds and waiting time. vegetarian food options are very limited, only 1 outlet is pure vegetarian in whole campus.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: placements are scarce due to heavy intake. campus infrastructure as it construction has not complete yet but the main building is very beautiful and eye catching there are numerous clubs which includes both technical and non technical clubs

Name: Manish
Review_Text: the seniors and faculties are very helpful in every manner the Id card management is very slow and take too much time to provide Id card attendance system is very strict you need to go through long procedure for leave

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Campus is very big, clean green and beautiful. More higher  package should be offered by the companies coming. I really liked the campus, its a very clean and green campus with immense facilities for studnets and alot of opportunities to grow more

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The fests and clubs offered by the university Food quality in all the mess is brilliant Campus is really big and seniors are really supportive.

Name: ABHINANDAN PATRA
Review_Text: Student intake is high and so competition is very high. campus life is so good you can experience everything in the campus You can meet your friends of your similar goal and you can achevie them by helping each other

Review_Text: you can find faculties and can do research and publish the papers under them The rules are some what strict in the campus There will a lot of academic  pressure like doing assignments, projects etc

Review_Text: Hostel fee is too high compared to the other colleges Campus life, hostels, friends, infrastructure Some faculty members are very good and helpful

Review_Text: Over crowed, there are like more than 40 thousand students in vit It is very strict university, they won't allow you to go outside the hostel after 9 pm The infrastructure of VIT is fabulous and it is so good for students who have come from all over the country

Name: Soumya Shaw
Review_Text: VIT has good security system, especially for girls The library is a whole new world with all the different kinds of books available here from journals to reference books. Do novels, every thing is available here. The hostel rooms, I think they could have done better

Name: Moula
Review_Text: Few of the faculty here doesn’t teach well So many exams and less time to read and prepare for it Great learning opportunities, library is awesome

Name: Sumit Moharana
Review_Text: Great campus, lots of greenery, well maintained Labs have AC, good equipment, classrooms are good Non-AC hostels shouldn't exist in Vellore's climate

Review_Text: Very crowdy, walking on footpaths is uncomfortable Environment is good. There are many trees. I mean to say greenary. Infrastructure is pretty good. Neat and clean.

Review_Text: Food is good. They give healthy diet. Also they give you fruits It is very croweded. Thats the one things here. Everything is paid here. Even the smallest things you have to buy

Review_Text: Campus life is the best in VIT. the campus is huge and feels good LIBRARY has almost all the books. and its really huge Labs are so well equipped and have access to all of them

Name: Parul Sharma
Review_Text: crowded campus so it usually feels conjusted campus is huge so have to walk too  much. Most of teachers are kind hearted and try to help you

Name: Vikash Patel
Review_Text: Campus Life is fully disciplined, favourable for girls especially Overall infrastructure is good and developing You have to bring some local guardian to go for outing

Name: Arnab Moitra
Review_Text: Wifi connection is closed after 12 am   . There are no variety of food in night mess Campus Infrastructure is very well maintained.

Name: Astha Malik
Review_Text: Rules of the college are very annoying.. The college campus is really beautiful and the greenery here is also very good. The curriculum is not very hard which makes it easy to cope up with studies.

Name: SUVRAT AGGARWAL
Review_Text: The labs are also of decent quality and you get plenty of time to work on your hobby. Sports facilities are really bad there is just not enough space to play. Hostel life is very bad and we are also not allowed to go outside college for 3 months.

Name: Dhruv Agarwal
Review_Text: There is just too much crowd whatever you wanna do there is always like a thousand people there. College campus - It's huge, with big buidings obv because of the huge number of students. Clubs and Chapters, Cultural Fest (Riviera) - Many of them are active and there are a lot of them.

Name: Nishant Chhabra
Review_Text: Diversity - Students from all states are there in VIT, also there are huge number of NRIs in VIT. Peer Group - Because of the hugeeee intake, peer group is obviously not great, there are all kind of students, but most of them are not good. Sports like indoor games are good and availability of items is also good.

Name: Nilanjan Kumar
Review_Text: Coding culture is good and competition among students is also good. Availability of transport for outing for hostellers is also good. Sports ground for football and cricket is not good.

Name: Pratik Kedia
Review_Text: Weather condition is quiet disturbing because of geographical area. Difficulty in interaction in markets to buy some essentials. Course selection process are quite good. students can actually sets own time table.

Name: Mihir Kedia
Review_Text: Lots of Extra curricular activities which can help to build student character Very Clean campus, classes, hostel , mess everything is very clean Some non AC classes. sometimes it's hard to sit and study

Name: Akhil Saxena
Review_Text: Main gate entry time is too early for students I like the campus infrastructure very well They provide a consistent and a quality lab facility for all of us

Review_Text: The faculties lecture was alsoo too gud and great The food they dell here was too expensive The lift facility was here but isn't sufficient for the entire vit

Name: Soham Saha
Review_Text: It is too difficult for us to go to the 8 floor without lift if the lift was full I like infrastructure of my campus because it is very good Campus life is very good, they also arrange buses for hostlers for outing.

Review_Text: The faculties are also very good every one is completed phd in the respective background of their teaching Clubs and chapters involvement in events  Various hackathons and competition during annual and tech events

Review_Text: Various webinars and workshops taken by industry experts  Mess food is horrible sometimes          .  It's not affordable for middle class people

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Exploring different cultures at the same time Not a big campus as such and they charge for everything basically Filled with telugus mostly and some of them including don't know English as well.

Review_Text: Very strict campus and college. And nothing much to explore around campus. And also a lot of couples Campus life, hostel life, clubs and chapters. Campus life sports fesrs like vitopia hostel

Name: Aaditya Vyas
Review_Text: Less number of students and huge crowd Various fests, hostel rooms, sports, infrastructure More fees less number of seats water issues

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Meeting with the friends and enjoying the college life. The restriction of not going out of hostel after 8:30pm. Faculty and staff was quite good and well educated. some of them were very friendly in nature.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: A lot of opportunities are there in this college, and so many things to explore. The college offers wide range of degree courses and the placements were quite good. Hostel life was a complete mess, with so many Restrictions.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The college is very costly, and there is a cost associated with each events. The college campus is very crowded with approx 5000 students. the exposure is really good here also this is a big environment with well structured ecosystem

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: There are lots of clubs and chapters you can join and interact with people of your interest and can share knowledge The placements here are very good with big companies offering jobs the academic pressure is high especially because of tough question papers

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: This College Offers Plenty Of Courses According To Students Interest And Placements Was Quite Good. There Are Lot Of Opportunities In This College. We Have Lots Of Options And So Many Things To Explore. Faculty Staff Was Quite Good And Well-Educated. Some Of Them Was Very Friendly With Students And Helpful In Nature.

Name: sparsh jain
Review_Text: Hostel Life Was Not Good. There Was So Many Restrictions. They Always Ask For Money Even In The College Fest And Almost All The Events In This College There Is So Many Students And College Campus Was So Much Crowded.

Name: Aaquib Neyaz
Review_Text: One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech FFCS. A study who is facing difficulty to study more, can take less number of credits and it will reduce the burden of the students. And the student can also Complete the entire course in 4 years instead of 5years  by taking maximum no of credits.  ~ Supriya R Patil, B.Sc + M.Sc Campus Life in Vit is simply magnificent.All types of facilities are provided inside the campus including sport complex and restaurants.The girls to boys ratio in Mechanical engineering is surprisinly high of about 1:7.  ~ Mithilesh Angal, B.Tech

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: I don’t like how the student and faculty ratio is 60-40  ~ Praveen Kumar, BCA Lot of exams yearly 3 exams in a semester 2-3 quiz and 1-2 DA  ~ Kartik Navnath Narare, B.Tech Water is really bad. 750+ TDS. It makes you go bald. Really.  ~ Piyush Prajapati, B.Des

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: VIT scholarship is offered by the Vellore Institute of Technology, Vellore. VIT scholarship is offered by the Vellore Institute of Technology, Vellore. Bus Facility At Hostel Is Good To Go Around Campus

Name: Soumyadip Mondal
Review_Text: You Need Permission And Time To Go Outside College I liked in my campus they are good at teaching and supporting students if they have new ideas There is no such kind of disliked in our college because our clg is best

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Infrastrutture. Faculty and classrooms are excellent Student life and atmosphere is good in the campus Campus is very far from the city in a remote area

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Campus has strict rules and regulations and timings Security is surrounded accross the campus ehich many of us dont like good social life and good infrastructure

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: great demand of vit certification and good quality of education good campus life,great faculty,high packages hike and ragging is not there food is totally worst at vit vellore and hostels are more expensive

Name: SHAYANI SAHA
Review_Text: canteens are good but with decent prices and low quality and taste ffcs(during faculty selection there must be a good servers ) VIT Campus which is known for its lively and active social life.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: VITS' annual cultural fest "Riviera" which is the largest cultural fest in south India VIT's tech fest "Gravitas" gives opportunities to take part in different hackathon. Have to walk for around 15 to 20 minutes from hostel to academic.

Name: Pujith Krishna
Review_Text: The temperature in Vellore goes around 35 to 40 degree celsius. Mess food something that I don't like at all. CAMPUS PLACEMENTS,SOCIAL LIFE,SPORTS FACLITIES,FFCS for selection of faculty,GOOD INFRASTRUCTURE

Name: CALINGARAYAR JEAN REMI
Review_Text: PROCTORED SYSTEM and good rules for students for a good discipline great curriculam and good availability of college buses inside the college SECURITY officers at vit are so worst and they are brainless creatures at vit

Name: Swetha
Review_Text: Hostel wardens are also worst that they cant even understand our problem ITS VARIOUS CULTURAL ACTIVITIES , SPORTS ACTIVITIES. ITS CLUB ACTIVITIES , SOCIAL AND CHAPTER ACTIVITIES.

Name: Ponnapoola hemachandrasai
Review_Text: NONE , AS YOU GET COMFORTABLE WITH NEW ENVIRONMENT AND ONE NEEDS TIME TO GET ADOPTED TO IT , ONCE YOU GET TO KNOW IT AND INVOLVE IN VARIOUS ACTIVITIES.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: I like the events clubs and faculties and the beautiful memories  are made here. Friends and moments with them.we have the most exciting stuff to do here. We have good sports and health faculties here.we have a complete building for fitness.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: May be the infrastructure which is yet to be developed. Beautiful campus, amazing infrastructure, helpful faculty. Amazing labs, high research output. There are many patents and research papers published by VIT and it's students per year.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Amazing events and very vast opportunities to explore your fields of interests. You'll find people of all kinds here. The language barrier. Most people here don't speak hindi or english so we basically have to communicate in sign and body language. There is absolutely nothing in the city of Vellore to actually explore. Also the restrictions for hostel and campus intime is a lot and the outing timings are very less. Strict overall.

Name: TANYA
Review_Text: The number of students are a lot. A total of 40,000 students makes this campus overcrowded. One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech FFCS. A study who is facing difficulty to study more, can take less number of credits and it will reduce the burden of the students. And the student can also Complete the entire course in 4 years instead of 5years  by taking maximum no of credits.  ~ Supriya R Patil, B.Sc + M.Sc

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Campus Life in Vit is simply magnificent.All types of facilities are provided inside the campus including sport complex and restaurants.The girls to boys ratio in Mechanical engineering is surprisinly high of about 1:7.  ~ Mithilesh Angal, B.Tech I don’t like how the student and faculty ratio is 60-40  ~ Praveen Kumar, BCA Lot of exams yearly 3 exams in a semester 2-3 quiz and 1-2 DA  ~ Kartik Navnath Narare, B.Tech

Name: Ayush Tiwary
Review_Text: Water is really bad. 750+ TDS. It makes you go bald. Really.  ~ Piyush Prajapati, B.Des Placements are very nice, many students get super dream packages College life is quite amazing, as hostel are quite happening and everyone unites into joy of each other.

Name: MAYURI DATARKAR
Review_Text: Campus is very nice and peaceful and it gets seceinic during monsoon and fall. Too much of crowd, there is more 20000 people currently on the campus. College is a little far from the Chennai City or any other Metropolitan, that makes airport access or any other service which is specific to something quite difficult.

Name: Pranay
Review_Text: Hostellers can not get out of their hostels after 9PM, even though you have two different zones seperated by railway line. Campus is good. Library infrastructure is also good Foodies, it is a place where student make their birthday and event.

Name: V Chandra Shekar
Review_Text: Classroom and Lab is also good. Placement is also average. All faculty are not supportive. They do just what they want. Mess food is not much good as you will think.

Name: Jensel George
Review_Text: No synchronization between hostel warden and HOD. The first thing I like is the campus architecture. The second thing which I liked is the campus life

Name: Sanyam Seth
Review_Text: The third is the hostel Life which we live over there. Library and campus best thing is there are many places to hangout. Foodys that is the best place to hangout with friends.

Name: Kabilan Ilangovan
Review_Text: Classes are really good labs are having all the equipments. Stress the students have a lot of assignments. Exams are really strict here and there is no scope to copy.

Name: Akarapunivasreddy
Review_Text: DA(Digital assignment) are to be submitted before deadline. Infrastructure is great. Study materials are great. Some faculties are very friendly and helpful.

Name: Jagan Rameshbabu
Review_Text: Variety of students from whom. We can learn many things . The crowd here is high as students from many categories come here. Education system is good , faculty is good.

Name: Gaurav Kumar
Review_Text: Food is not good , any to much expensive. The course curricullum , After just 1 year you are free from your studies and you can focus ond eveloping your skills for placments. The placement cell is very good , even in recession many companies are visiting the campus

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The faculty and the exposure in VIT is very good Too much focus on study oriented subjects and lack of practical knowledge. The research based learning procedure of writing research paper is sometimes hectic.

Name: Ayush Kumar Sinha
Review_Text: The college strictness in everything , for PDA and other rules and regulations. Campus, different state students and infrastructure and placement. The different language speaking people i like most and mostly people usage english.

Name: Shubham Nagori
Review_Text: Strictlness of college like you can not go outside of college for more than 4 hours. Also the humidity here is lot because of sea. Some faculties are really good they will teach you nicely and friendly.

Name: kannan gothandapani
Review_Text: campus is very green and beautiful it is fun to roam around. the academics is not super tough it is well divided and easy to do but somewhat handwork needed. some faculties are worst they will even fail you.

Name: Saloni Jaiswal
Review_Text: the security is very very strict pda is also there. in some cases things take too much time the rules are very very strict. I liked the doctorate faculty members and the location of the campus

Name: Amey Vinayak Diwan
Review_Text: I disliked about the campus is there construction One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech FFCS. Name: Baisampayan Moitra
Review_Text: Water is really bad. 750+ TDS. It makes you go bald. Really.  ~ Piyush Prajapati, B.Des Infrastructure is really good, the Atmosphere takes you in, the weather is grea.t Mess food is best among other colleges and menu is big.

Name: Jayeetra Bhattacharjee
Review_Text: 100% placements is guaranteed, no matter what cgpa or skill u have u will be placed. The worst thing are the PDA guards a guy and girl can't walk sit together according to the college too conservative. Some times teacher become partial towards South Indians as they are from the same area or so.

Name: Ashish Modi
Review_Text: In time for the college is 7 pm.... This is too early I liked the amenities of the college and  library is a big pro for this college and there are many blocks and classrooms. I didn't like the staff that much because they do not explain briefly and they don't give the PPT's properly on time.

Name: hritik jha
Review_Text: There are lot of opportunities in this college. we have lots of options and so many things to explore. Faculty staff was quite good and well-educated. Some of them was very friendly with students and helpful in nature. This college offers plenty of courses according to students interest and placements was quite good.

Name: RANJITH M
Review_Text: In this college there is so many students and college campus was so much crowded. Hostel life was not good. There was so many restrictions. They always ask for money even in the college fest and almost all the events.

Name: Sam tamor
Review_Text: It is situated in the village of Sehore district almost 70 Km from the City . Peacefull place Almost every corners of the the INDIA students came here Faculty members and campus is also good every where evergreen tress are there

Name: Dhrumil
Review_Text: It is too far from city sometimes basic things are not available placements offered  by the institute are very good curriculum is very good and effective ..

Name: Venkatesh
Review_Text: FFCS fully credit system allows the student make own timetable. Campus is under construction so not able to enjoy it fully hostel accomodation process is ok ......

Name: Priyanshu shukla
Review_Text: strict ness in the campus , PDA and restrictions The Campus life and the experiences I gained. The exposure it provides to the students.

Name: NANDANURU Deekshith reddy
Review_Text: Overall aspects in terms of safety, and good environment. The classrooms could've had air conditioners based on the temperature of Chennai. The size of the campus is a bit small owing to the fact that the strength is 8k.

Name: Sarthak Patel
Review_Text: The food is a bit monotonous and sometimes the quality is compromised. Highly qualified, experienced, and supportive faculty. Well-equipped facilities and modern resources.

Name: Sivanesan G
Review_Text: Flexibility in elective choices and customization of the curriculum Occasional overwhelming schedule of events and activities. Insufficient study spaces and overcrowded facilities, affecting productivity and concentration.

Name: Rimjhim Singh
Review_Text: Campus is very good and with full of trees in the campus In the campus there are more food stalls and one stationary store also present. All labs are constructed with central AC.

Name: Kartik kumar
Review_Text: Very small campus according to area building are very near. More crowd like the strength of students is more Outing permissions are very strict that too allowed only on Sunday.

Name: Pranjal Raj
Review_Text: The FFCS structure which enables you to design your own time table and select the professors which you desire. The college is overcrowded due to the large no. of students joining each year including the day scholars. I like the sports facilities and the faculties as they are very helpful.

Name: PRANJAL TIWARI
Review_Text: I also like the fest which is well organised. I like the seniors as they are very helpful. I don't like the mess food sometimes as it is not that good.

Name: Aayush
Review_Text: There is also not that much fast food chains inside the campus. Also the campus is far from the nearest city One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech

Review_Text: FFCS. A study who is facing difficulty to study more, can take less number of credits and it will reduce the burden of the students. Review_Text: Lot of exams yearly 3 exams in a semester 2-3 quiz and 1-2 DA  ~ Kartik Navnath Narare, B.Tech Water is really bad. 750+ TDS. It makes you go bald. Really.  ~ Piyush Prajapati, B.Des Library with more than 6000 volumes of books,  wifi connection from 6 to 12pm and easy way to learn books

Name: Sharyu Deshmukh
Review_Text: Faculty with great experince and guide students in good way study over hours and those who are not friendly sometime food which i dislike are provided

Name: Sai Abhishek
Review_Text: Campus Life was soo good here with more than 120 acres of huge campus Almost 50% students getting placed gets above 10LPA which is a dream for many institutions. Flexible curriculum for each student and every student gets to select their faculty

Name: Prajul Gupta
Review_Text: A little bit too crowded campus with lots of students studying. Bus service provided could have been Air conditioned since many travel about 70Kms up and down everyday Few semesters were too short and it was hard to keep up the pace which shall be changed.

Name: Tatvavid Tripathi
Review_Text: The infrastructure of college is great. Loved it. The hostel Life is amazing also the placements are decent. The faculty is well versed and trained. It's great.

Name: Tushar Singh
Review_Text: Mess food is not that good, it's like any other hostel food shown in movies. The college is a little expensive and also the batch size is very big. The placements can be better more and college can increase the percentage.

Name: Christo Jose
Review_Text: Campus life is good there are a lot of trees in campus. The campus size is huge and the buildings are well designed. Students come from all over the world so there is diversity.

Name: Dhruval dhobi
Review_Text: The weather in vellore is very hot and humid. The college is very crowded there are almost 30k students. Too much work load we have exams every 40 days.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Academic of college ( The syllabus of vit bhopal is very nice) faculty of vit bhopal is good  ( very helpful. ) Placement  statistics  of  vit bhopal is also a thing which I liked the most

Name: Chidvi
Review_Text: Campus Life of college as it is in construction phase I liked the college campus because they are fully green environment I liked the faculty members they all are guided very well in the scoring and practical manner

Name: Prakhar Agrawal
Review_Text: I liked placement in VIT speciality is around 80%of the students are placed I dislike the campus life during the function time I dislike the infrastructure because Kenya comes the social issues

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: I dislike the placement when they are first preferred for topper students I liked the teachers, the environment and the opportunities this college provides. Regular guidance and mentorship from faculty members and guests help us nourish our personalities and inspire us to do great things in life. The buildings aren't suffiecient since its a new college. Although construction is rapid and in the coming years, it'll be a beautiful fully developed campus.

Name: Utsav Mittal
Review_Text: The restrictions here are extreme and making the basics of college life expectations ruin. We can't go outside the campus more than twice a month, can't wear shorts, can't roam in the campus after 6pm, etc. I liked of giving permission to go out for shopping every day through the time is limited, but not seen in every college. The teaching methods are very good , quite impressive.

Name: SHASHANK ACHARYA
Review_Text: The campus is good because of infrastructure and it's greenness. Campus life if you get holiday like one or two days you can't go out of town because it is a small town. The things I liked here the campus is very good and have very good environment.

Name: Ankit Kapil
Review_Text: Campus is very small and more crowded campus. the placements provided by vit is decent and nearly app the students gets placed. the infrasturcture of the college is too good.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: if you are 9 pointer you dont need to sit in class and there is no 75% attendence rule for you. the 75% attendance criteria is like a nightmare for many students. the size of the campus is very big and sometimes you have to cover a long distance in short period of time.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: the fee structure of vit is complicated and many cant afford it. One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech FFCS. Name: Suhail
Review_Text: Water is really bad. 750+ TDS. It makes you go bald. Really.  ~ Piyush Prajapati, B.Des College infrastructure, big buildings good cafeteria and neatly gardened. Free of encouragement of new ideas and they sponser if the idea was good.

Name: Gaurav Jha
Review_Text: The friendly nature by the faculties and can inovate new things. The fees are too high and not having a proper classroom that causing to sit on the steps etc. As students are changing  every semister we will be missing our friends.

Name: Snehil Kulshourestha
Review_Text: At the time of registration for an new semister we will be missing the faculties due to the site crash Hostel is very good as it also provides AC rooms as in vellore the temperature is always high Placement is great as nearly 900 companies visit here to hire students

Name: Prashasti Singh
Review_Text: In time for students in college is 7pm and hostel is 9pm Widespread provision of infrastructure and academic excellence Vast availability of cultural fests and technical fests as well

Name: Sanket Ashok Mahadik
Review_Text: Very well developed Student Support services and Entrepreneurship opportunities Less availability of Hostel amenities to students Out of date employees other than faculties

Name: Ashish singh
Review_Text: Failing in providing a modern society experience completely inside the campus Very good campus life and full of trees and pleasant atmosphere Small campus with more number of students

Name: NILADRI
Review_Text: I like the lush green campus and very pleasant. Sports amenities are very high and ground maintained is good. Classes timing are very good we can choose faculties.

Name: sahil kumar mishoura
Review_Text: Very small space campus and high strength. Campus strength is so high and very less . I like the campus and environment there we can enjoy.

Name: Ritika Varu
Review_Text: Many things are there we can enjoy there. There will be many blocks and canteens and hotels. There wont be allowed after 9:o clock outside.

Name: Jai Gulati
Review_Text: There will be conditions inside the hoste. For outing yhere will be certain process. The atmosphere and the facilities present

Name: Sai phanindra
Review_Text: The Library and the facilities available in it The faculty and the smart class rooms in it Over crowded everywhere and many people present

Name: Sachi
Review_Text: No one care about us only we have to think about us Can go in a wrong way if we do wrong things Mess facilities sports facilities, library

Name: Chandrakanthoureddy Badveli
Review_Text: Campus infrastructure, environment, library, sports ground FFCS system- Fully flexible credit system which allows you to choose your own timetable. Plenty of opportunities are available in placements.

Name: Aditi
Review_Text: Very populated- VIT campus is very populated which degrades the quality. Campus is very big which makes it very difficult to travel inside. Irrelevant rules such as 75% attendance system, we have to be in hostels before 9pm.

Name: Aditya Bhardwaj
Review_Text: College was so interesting. Every day was much fun with friends attending all the classes Infrastructure is so good that students feel relaxed when ever they feel like stressed Faculty are also so good that they make a path for us through our the college life into a well settled job turning up us into great skilled workers

Name: Sindhuja Vaddi
Review_Text: The timings to attend for the classes is little problematic One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech FFCS.
