Name: Pritam Chaurasiya
Review_Text: Placements in this university are very good Mess food as you can get it like in your home Far to the city should travel atleast 1 nd half hour to go Bhopal city

Name: Prarthana
Review_Text: Social life in the campus of very very good. We can choose the faculty of the subjects we need and the slot in the time table we need The restriction are too high we can't go out when we need.

Name: Abhishek sarkar
Review_Text: We should go to the hostel at 9 pm and u can't go ut before 7 am Population is too high on which only CSE has 5000 strength and of a single batch The campus is green and well maintained and all sports faculities are available but they are paid

Name: Hemanth Krishna
Review_Text: You will make friends from all over the country so a great place to make networks If a student is serious about studies ,Vit is the place for them The intake is very high so the campus is always crowded and there is lot of competition

Name: KARTHIK DURGAVAJJALA
Review_Text: There are more than 3500 students in cse alone so not a very good place for cs students The college is very money oriented and the most strict campus in india Diverse culture: Here the students are literally from all the corners of India. So you get very diverse culture to explore.

Name: Manvendra Singh
Review_Text: 9 pointer advantage: If your CGPA is above 9 then you don't have to attend classes. Like the 75% criteria will not applicable on you. FFCS: The FFCS is fully fixable course selection in which we can design our time-table and can choose the faculty to whom we want to study. Over-Crowding : The intake of VIT is extremally high if I talk about my batch in 2021 batch there are approx. 7500 student present. Hence the campus is so much crowded.

Name: Ayush anand
Review_Text: High-Competition: Because of high in-take the competition also increases in thing like hostel-selection, placement ,etc. Extra Ordinary Restrictions: In campus we have so much restrictions to follow , in-time of boys is 9 pm and for girls it's 8:30 PM which they follow so strictly. there are PDA guards also. It explores in many ways provides major and minor degree courses

Name: Shubh Rastogi
Review_Text: Partical knowledge and coding course is very challenging It explores our talent by participating in events It has timings upto 9 morning 6 evening which takes time for traveling  long distances for 2 hours daily

Name: Shantanu Priyadarshi
Review_Text: There is no proper food avalibilty as food canteens only few are now present There is huge border campus there're 3 blocks Faculty cooperation is nice and very friendly nature.

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: Faculty is highly qualified with almost 100% doctors. Campus is very big , beutiful with garden, canteen, shopping mall. About 2kms from Bhopal Indore highway.

Name: Damodharan K
Review_Text: Shops,rental rooms are very costly with low quality nearby areas. Very far from Bhopal, Indore and sorrounding of the area is a small village with insects in nearby croplands. The people you meet, lot of diverse people from different regions of India and even different countries

Name: Anushouree vinu
Review_Text: Infrastructure is very good and well maintained The environment of the campus is amazing The cramed up schedules of exams and assignments

Name: Sharanya
Review_Text: The response of VIT administration to problems faced by students The overall fees structure for the college and hostel The college and hostel experience, the quality of life is actually very comfortable, the food in the mess is pretty good.

Name: Ankit
Review_Text: There is plenty of physical activities and sports teams and competition so that's a huge plus point. The fact that the college is reputed means there is a lot of options for working in large companies with the suggestion from the college. The fact that the classroom have no air conditioning makes it extremely hot and unbearable in the summer.

Name: Aditya Yadav
Review_Text: Some of the faculty are very mean and are overly strict and annoying. There is one specific mess which has very bad food and that is a hassle if you are assigned that mess. Hostel facilities and exposure of college is superb.

Name: P.sai Kiran
Review_Text: Classrooms are also too good  . every classroom has a attached projector and some of them also have smart boards . and there are special classes specially for coding FFCS  ( Fully flexible credit system)   . There is no scope for a sports person   .

Name: Buvan
Review_Text: There are many restrictions in hostel . You feel like you are living in a jail. Some faculties promotes rote learning which i disliked the most. One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech

And the student can also Complete the entire course in 4 years instead of 5years  by taking maximum no of credits.  ~ Supriya R Patil, B.Sc + M.Sc Campus Life in Vit is simply magnificent.All types of facilities are provided inside the campus including sport complex and restaurants.The girls to boys ratio in Mechanical engineering is surprisinly high of about 1:7.  ~ Mithilesh Angal, B.Tech I don’t like how the student and faculty ratio is 60-40  ~ Praveen Kumar, BCA

Name: Hinal Vithlani
Review_Text: Lot of exams yearly 3 exams in a semester 2-3 quiz and 1-2 DA  ~ Kartik Navnath Narare, B.Tech Water is really bad. 750+ TDS. It makes you go bald. Really.  ~ Piyush Prajapati, B.Des The campus life and the campus is so beautiful.

Name: Sumanth Krishna
Review_Text: The extracurricular activities are just amazing. The faculty in the campus are helping and very kind. The hostel room can be more cleaner and washed more often.

Name: Nikhar gangwar
Review_Text: The mess food can get improved and the menus changes very week. The travel cost is to high to travel inside the city. The Course Curriculum, and the relevance of the subjects taught in the current world.

Name: Nilanjan Banerjee
Review_Text: The Classrooms and the FFCS system, which allows us to choose our desired teachers and timings for our classes. The quality and the infrastructure of the hostels is very good. The underdevelopment of the campus and the lack of activities to do in college.

Name: SP Tavva
Review_Text: Students having to attend Online Classes due to lack of accommodation in hostels. The strictness of the college in some aspects, one of it being that the students have to return inside their hostels by 9:00pm and are not allowed to make any noise by mistake or they will be caught It has lush green campus , have many graden to spend time there

Name: ANISH KUMAR
Review_Text: There is too strictness in college. It is also beneficial to maintain the population but some time it isn't good The infrastructure is good and it’s clean The culture here is good and people are very educated

Name: E Lakshmi Santhan
Review_Text: Everyone speaks in english and it’s good for personality development The admission process or the category based admissions is what makes other colleges better than vit We don’t get as many holidays as we should

Name: Pankaj Talesara
Review_Text: The course options and the variety of clubs. The sheer number of students that makes it hard to stand out from the crowd. Hostel is the best place if you have friends especially block 1

Name: Garvit Jain
Review_Text: The faculties are understanding and supportive The college is still in developing phase so it may take a bit of time to get all the things done Many clubs. One thing I like about my college is it has many clubs.

Name: Harshitha Devineni
Review_Text: Badminton court and cricket ground are good. Rooms are big. College campus is also big. Distance between college and hostel is alot

Name: Abraham George
Review_Text: Food near college is costly and to reach to hostel it takes a lot of time The weather conditions are very harsh. Too cold in winters and too sunny and hot in summers. College becomes river in monsoons The freedom to choose your faculty is a really good thing as the students can take the teachers they are comfortable with.

Name: Aneesh Gunda
Review_Text: The mess food is really good and the cleaning staff ia also working nicely. The incomplete infrastructure has a little impact on campus life which is not too big of a problem. Placement/internship Opportunities and salary packages

Name: Rishabh Keshan
Review_Text: College life is really amazing, Tech fest and cultural fest is one of the best in the country(falls under top 10 fests in the country) Anti Ragging and disciplined campus, all seniors are really sweet! Too expensive and doesnt provide the value expected

Name: Rishabh agarwal
Review_Text: Poor Infrastructure and boring classrooms The things which i liked in the college campus is its full of gardens and green area. you can choose whatever course you like and you've got many options.

Name: B ARUL GNANA JOTHI
Review_Text: Faculties here are pretty good except some. Some faculties are pretty bad here , especially the proctors. Its very strict when it comes to discipline.

Name: Akshat Saxena
Review_Text: High fee structure . yeah its affordable but its still overpriced. One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech FFCS. A study who is facing difficulty to study more, can take less number of credits and it will reduce the burden of the students. And the student can also Complete the entire course in 4 years instead of 5years  by taking maximum no of credits.  ~ Supriya R Patil, B.Sc + M.Sc

Name: Reddy nagendra Kola
Review_Text: Campus Life in Vit is simply magnificent.All types of facilities are provided inside the campus including sport complex and restaurants.The girls to boys ratio in Mechanical engineering is surprisinly high of about 1:7.  ~ Mithilesh Angal, B.Tech I don’t like how the student and faculty ratio is 60-40  ~ Praveen Kumar, BCA Lot of exams yearly 3 exams in a semester 2-3 quiz and 1-2 DA  ~ Kartik Navnath Narare, B.Tech

Name: Aryan Raj Drolia
Review_Text: Water is really bad. 750+ TDS. It makes you go bald. Really.  ~ Piyush Prajapati, B.Des Faculty is hardworking and experienced. They are always there to help. Hostel facilities and mess facilities which are way better than any other campus.

Name: LAKSHYA JAIN
Review_Text: Expensive canteen. food not worth the money. Having no exposure as the college is located in a literal village we big college in terms of size, lots there to explore

Name: Sushitha
Review_Text: sports facilities are very good, gym excellent has a lot of canteens inside college to eat Campus Life Many students enjoy the vibrant and lively campus at VIT.The campus often offers a variety of extracurricular activities, clubs and other events providing opportunity for personal growth.

Name: Mradul Singhal
Review_Text: Faculty: Is known for its qualified faculty members who posses expertise in their respective field. The crowd of students is decent although it is more than what the accomodation the college can handle. The sports culture is very nice as all sports players you find will be very competitive and this makes it a growth potential environment

Name: Kushagra
Review_Text: The faculty is approachable and will help if you go to them for any assistance. The infrastructure is not up to the mark as the college is still under construction Location of the college.

Name: K Kameswar Subudhi
Review_Text: Overall experience was really good and enjoyable We can have a very good and excellent life The campus provides us with a sense of joy

Name: Kaviyarasu K
Review_Text: Things I disliked are that there are hectic The schedules in the academics are tight The distance from one block to another is high

Name: TENKAYALA BHUVAN
Review_Text: Good placement record, Good infra including classrooms, labs, library and sports facilites. FFCS is very helpful in plannig our courses and timetable. Various clubs and renowned international chapters are present.

Name: himanshu bhardwaj
Review_Text: The population is rising every year, it is a very big problem. The campus life is too good here.You get to know different people from different places around India. The university has outstanding infrastructure with all the facilities required.

Name: G NANDA KISHORE REDDY
Review_Text: There are different slots, you can either choose morning classes or afternoon classes, its up to you. FFCS, which might be very unfavourable to students sometimes The hostel counselling process is a bit complicated since its based on ur CGPA

Name: Rathore Chinmay
Review_Text: The population is rising every year. But they are trying to expand more and they building many blocks for it I liked a infrastructure the most and it has capability to handle  thousands of students and quality of education is best people from all over the country as well as other countries come and study together and it is a unique experience

Name: Rohit Raj
Review_Text: faculties and proctor are very supportive and thats why it is home away from home the rules and regulations are little strict and also outing time should be increased in weekends it should reduce intake if it does so then it has a potential to become best engineering college of india

Name: Rohan Panicker
Review_Text: here there is hard water so some of the people face problems for hairs so that thing should be improved The campus at VIT is very pleasent providing us a good environment for studying The faculty here are very approachable and gives us with a lot of opportunities

Name: Manav Modi
Review_Text: The college has a very good placement record, so we go out with flying colors clubs and chapters are really good in VIT Internship oppurtunities provided to us by the campus

Name: Dheeraj yadav
Review_Text: campus placement opportunities are good. One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech FFCS. A study who is facing difficulty to study more, can take less number of credits and it will reduce the burden of the students. And the student can also Complete the entire course in 4 years instead of 5years  by taking maximum no of credits.  ~ Supriya R Patil, B.Sc + M.Sc

Name: Saurabh Singh
Review_Text: Campus Life in Vit is simply magnificent.All types of facilities are provided inside the campus including sport complex and restaurants.The girls to boys ratio in Mechanical engineering is surprisinly high of about 1:7.  ~ Mithilesh Angal, B.Tech I don’t like how the student and faculty ratio is 60-40  ~ Praveen Kumar, BCA Lot of exams yearly 3 exams in a semester 2-3 quiz and 1-2 DA  ~ Kartik Navnath Narare, B.Tech

Name: Swastika Das
Review_Text: Water is really bad. 750+ TDS. It makes you go bald. Really.  ~ Piyush Prajapati, B.Des I liked the campus life. The campus is very big and hence can move around and have long walks. The one thing I was the number of students in the college. The number of students are around 40k.

Name: Sharmila
Review_Text: Faculty:VIT boasts a qualified and experienced faculty who are knowledgeable in their respective fields.Students appreciate the experience ,guidance and support provided by the faculty members. Campus Life:VIT has a vibrant and engaging campus life with diverse student community. Students often appreciate the opportunities for cultural, technical and sports event which foster a lively and inclusive atmosphere. Infrastructure:VIT offers modern and well quipped infrastructure with state of the art facilities.Students appreciate the well maintained classrooms .libraries and laboratory which facilitate academic pursuits.

Name: SrinivasaRaju
Review_Text: Greenery, architecture, studies, faculty. PDA guards are over here . If you are holding hands only they will snatch your I'd card. The campus is huge and spacious with green and pleasant views of nature.

Name: Abhimanyu olla
Review_Text: There is a lot of scope for improvement and development of ourselves . The clubs here are very helpful for our career planning and future goals. There are a lot of students out there which makes it a bit crowded.

Name: Pramit Ghosh
Review_Text: The heat is a major issue as vellore temperatures are very high throughout the day. The college is very reputed and has a very good infrastructure all the faculty  members are also very helpful Teaching teachnology and placements .there is caltech method here used for teaching

Name: himanshu bhardwaj
Review_Text: In this college there is ffcs system through which you are able to choose your own time table that weather you want to go class in morning 8;30 or evening 4:30 that's totally up to you. I like the that we get unlimited Wi-Fi in hostels and so over the campus. We have multiple gyms near the campus and in the campus.

Name: Ritik Gupta
Review_Text: The hostel facility and variations in the amount of options. I dislike that Wi-Fi is  closed after 12:30 at night. Everything is a little more costly compared to other colleges.

Name: SHIVAM
Review_Text: Too much restrictions regarding hostel in time. The staff  and faculty are very helpful and friendly. The Placements are also quiet fine. If you work hard,no one can stop yoy from getting a good placement on campus.

Name: Sunderam sah
Review_Text: Also there is no dress code, which is a plus point. The only thing I disliked is that they can't accomodate all the batches together because of their lack of hostels College placements are good and oppurtunities to study in some of the best foreign universities.

Name: Atharva Shinde
Review_Text: Fests and events that happen here, also a lot of club choices to offer. The Curriculum, FFCS system, Relative grading system. Locality of campus as we can't explore the city.

Name: Rishabh Agrawal
Review_Text: Hostels are not fully constructed, so the i don't like the online semester going on. We have a very beautiful lake in our campus. Nescafe outlets available in every little distance.

Name: rishi raj pandey
Review_Text: Sheds available to walk in almost the whole campus. The intime for students at night is very early. We can't wait outside our hostel after 9pm

Name: Akshay kokadwar
Review_Text: Wifi gets closed sorry midnight and the speed is also very low One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech FFCS. A study who is facing difficulty to study more, can take less number of credits and it will reduce the burden of the students. And the student can also Complete the entire course in 4 years instead of 5years  by taking maximum no of credits.  ~ Supriya R Patil, B.Sc + M.Sc

Name: boggarapu kushalkumar
Review_Text: Campus Life in Vit is simply magnificent.All types of facilities are provided inside the campus including sport complex and restaurants.The girls to boys ratio in Mechanical engineering is surprisinly high of about 1:7.  ~ Mithilesh Angal, B.Tech I don’t like how the student and faculty ratio is 60-40  ~ Praveen Kumar, BCA Lot of exams yearly 3 exams in a semester 2-3 quiz and 1-2 DA  ~ Kartik Navnath Narare, B.Tech

Name: Annangi Tanmay
Review_Text: Water is really bad. 750+ TDS. It makes you go bald. Really.  ~ Piyush Prajapati, B.Des supportive teacher and staff i liked the strict rule of here, boys and girl have to follow rules

Name: Ashita Satpathy
Review_Text: if you want leave then you havw to follow so many rule to go outside Better exposure, campus environment, vast diversity Near to railway station amd bus station and other public places

Name: ABUL
Review_Text: Good placements, facilities No uniform, tamilian domination and importance given to them No proper support to National Cadet Corps

Name: Sai Susanth Geddam
Review_Text: No proper support for National service scheme The Campus is quite BIG and you have lot of places to visit The academic enviroment id quite good as you can choose your own teacher and form your own Time table

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: The campus placement is good and you can get placed in good companies The vellore area is quite HOT and humid. It is quite stressful to give this many Exams and quizes

Name: Ravi Raj
Review_Text: The Amount of students are quite a lot i dont if this is a good thing or a bad thing I like the atmosphere and opportunities provided I dislike the attendance policy and it should be given to everyone regardless of the grades

Name: Pranav Pandey
Review_Text: I really like the faculties and the overall academics The classes are good and the people studying are also good The seniors are really helpful and supportive too

Name: Vimal Nathan P
Review_Text: There is no social life in the college. The fests are really bad and the culbs have no funds It is very strict for a college and has some lame rules

Name: Roshini
Review_Text: campus maintenance, safety is really good. Lab facilities are really great and you will have real time  labs unlike other colleges. You see most of your schedule is molded around you and no one restricts you and noone will question if you didn't attend classes  so it all depends on you

Name: Venkata Lokesh Guttula
Review_Text: Mess food will be really bland and portion sizes given will be very less. Your travel options are very restricted and auto Mafia is rampant . You want have anything nearby campus to explore so you get bored easily on weekends.

Name: Yeshwant
Review_Text: FESTS are commenced very month and are very enjoyable tournaments are also convicted are also very intresting and enjoyable teachers are good and the ratio of boys and girls are also good

Name: Akshay Ramesh
Review_Text: Discipline is taken care. Good environment for studies. College is very safe. Almost zero ragging. Curriculum is very nice and faculties are friendly.

Name: Akki kokadwar
Review_Text: College life is more than expected hectic. Social life is almost zero as we have sp many exams DAs abd quizzes. There are some stupid rules. In tume in hostel is way too strict.

Name: Prakrit Raj
Review_Text: I like Greenery of my college as it provide a asthetic view and refreshes our mind. I like faculty and staffs as they are very helpful. I like placement cell as they are very helpful.

Name: Venkat Mukthineni
Review_Text: Nothing I disliked about my college. everything is good. everything is good. nothing is to be disliked. everything is good .nothing needs to be disliked.

Name: Moumita Dhang
Review_Text: I loved about VIT University is there is more chance for experimental exposure and also theoretical studying. The campus and the environment they have created is very refreshing and Lovely One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech

Name: Lahari Adavala
Review_Text: FFCS. A study who is facing difficulty to study more, can take less number of credits and it will reduce the burden of the students. And the student can also Complete the entire course in 4 years instead of 5years  by taking maximum no of credits.  ~ Supriya R Patil, B.Sc + M.Sc Campus Life in Vit is simply magnificent.All types of facilities are provided inside the campus including sport complex and restaurants.The girls to boys ratio in Mechanical engineering is surprisinly high of about 1:7.  ~ Mithilesh Angal, B.Tech I don’t like how the student and faculty ratio is 60-40  ~ Praveen Kumar, BCA

Name: Prerna Sarkar
Review_Text: Lot of exams yearly 3 exams in a semester 2-3 quiz and 1-2 DA  ~ Kartik Navnath Narare, B.Tech Water is really bad. 750+ TDS. It makes you go bald. Really.  ~ Piyush Prajapati, B.Des The campus infrastructure and beauty is great.

Name: Samruddha
Review_Text: The friends make the college life memorable. The faculties are supportive and hard working. The in-time for girls is so early  and many more restrictions

Name: Srivatsan.b
Review_Text: There is no freedom to move outside the campus without permission especially for girls Placement of the college is good  enough considering its a new branch of vit. Infrastucture of the college is good. Classroom ,library and the campus is well maintained and clean.

Name: Priti Mondal
Review_Text: Hostels, mess are also good. The college keeps updating the course to teach only what is required and can be applied. Only application based question are asked in exam no direct qustions. Outing time and library time should increase presenty its 5pm for library and 8:30 for hostel. Best library has more than five thousand books

Name: Yoshitha
Review_Text: Largest sports ground The college is surrounded by trees and there is no pollution Our college is 20 km away from the city and not even close The campus placement is good and they have Air Conditioner in 2 Classes.

Name: Poornendu Chatterjee
Review_Text: There is free Wifi all over the campus at 1mb/sec There are only bus facility for teachers only, The canteen is very bad. No good quality is serverd.

Name: K.vishnu vardhan reddy
Review_Text: The hostels are cleaned whenever there is a need to do so. The environment is very green and pleasant. The stadiums here are quite big and we can play the sport which we like to play.

Name: Ashish Kumar
Review_Text: Mess is overly crowded sometimes which even degrades the quality of food. Student intake is increasing year after another and there is no space to accommodate so many students. Two mid term tests before main semester exam doesn't give us the time to chill around

Name: S.v.surya vamsi
Review_Text: Discipline that is maintained on campus . The infrastructure of campus is very good as compared to other colleges. Hotels' lives are very good too many friends too many enjoyments .

Name: ABHIRAM.G
Review_Text: The settle system on campus takes charge of students. The settle take 15 for only 1 km that is high. The bunker bed in the hostel is a very bad system.

Name: Subhankar Panigrahi
Review_Text: Education quality. The teachers here are extremely wise and come from colleges like IIT and NIT. So, they know the subject well and explain the same to you thoroughly. Social life. People here are extremely friendly, making it quite nice to mingle with people. Extra curricular activities. I boxed and did judo for 3 years before college, and was sad that i'd have to let go of it. However, after joining VIT, these amenities were already facilitated, which is great.

Name: Chaman Goyal
Review_Text: Management quality. Sometimes people don't seem to care as much as you'd expect out of a prestigious college like VIT. Overcrowded. A mass of students from South India come here for education, which brings along certain other problems like Groupism etc. I liked the hostel and mess food provided

Name: Vivek Waykule
Review_Text: I liked the sun rise and sunset view from my room I liked the infrastructure of the college College is still in construction phase..

Name: SAI TEJA Sunkari
Review_Text: Huge competition is there in exams as grade is provided relatively Proper playground is not available here.. Greenary and ambience is quiet excellent. Campus size is just enough.

Name: Thomas Tom
Review_Text: Too much availablity of knowledge everywhere as event and challenges comes up time to time Sometimes the college is crowded and too much students in a class Management is not very good and so are the websites .

Name: Sourabh agarwal
Review_Text: Too many rules to be followed. Freedom is less. Too much pressure for students Faculty,sports amenities and the greenary Red tag annas😂 and sometimes food here is not so good

Name: Anonymous
Review_Text: One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech FFCS. A study who is facing difficulty to study more, can take less number of credits and it will reduce the burden of the students. Name: Aravind Harinarayanan
Review_Text: I don’t like how the student and faculty ratio is 60-40  ~ Praveen Kumar, BCA Lot of exams yearly 3 exams in a semester 2-3 quiz and 1-2 DA  ~ Kartik Navnath Narare, B.Tech Water is really bad. 750+ TDS. It makes you go bald. Really.  ~ Piyush Prajapati, B.Des

Name: Soumyajit Mitra
Review_Text: College Campus which plays the vital role in student’s college life. Hygiene in the campus is very good.     - The FFCS system, by which we can create our own preferred schedule.

Name: Shivani shrote
Review_Text: Mess food is not up to our expectations. The FFCS, as sometimes courses gets filled soon and you wont get to enroll. We have to change our Hostel every year, which is a burden.

Name: Fenil Jain
Review_Text: AC rooms - Their are AC as well as Non AC rooms available as per convenience. Placement - The placement system is very robust with atleast 800 companies coming for recruitment every year. Conservative Strictness about Public Display of Affection and Going out of campus, celebrating birthdays, etc.

Name: Karthik Velmurugan
Review_Text: Very high fees for the tuition as well as infrastructure (including Hostel and mess) The project components are very demanding and most of the time not very productive for either the students or professors. The facilities provided in the labs for the student

Name: SURESH S
Review_Text: The infrastructure and teaching by the teachers The fests and sports activities as well as the connections to the nearest railway station Few rules which are strict regarding academics

Name: Suraj R
Review_Text: teachers asking for parents permission for every leave request The distance between hostel blocks and academic blocks Teaching prospective, lab classes, there are so much systems are available in labs

Name: Indumathi Thyagarajan
Review_Text: Cleaniness like everyday road were cleaned. And there are no mosquito cuz they do mosquito spray. there are sheds for walking and inside campus everything is available For girls and boys this college is very strict.

Name: Harshit Bhatt
Review_Text: For small things they do a big fine. Like cake cutting inside hostel has 6000ruppees fone Here it is too hot and in theory classes there is no AC Campus is lovable, green plants, cute animals and the environment.

Name: Nagarohith Ramanadham
Review_Text: Versatile crowd,  cultural celebrations. Hostel facilities were good keeping in mind the locality. Food in the mess was good in the beggining.

Name: Gaurav Kumar Singh
Review_Text: Guards try to invade privacy a lot. Too much student intake which makes it too much crowded here. College fest here are very good the arrangement specially.

Name: Vidhya Vasu
Review_Text: The infrastructure in vit is vey good foe ex library academic block. The faculty here is very good and supportive Here competition is very high so very difficilult to stand out

Name: Senthil kumar
Review_Text: Here rules and regulations are very strict. Here some of the blocks have very bad washrooms Meeting new people. Everyone likes meeting new people. ... College popularity. Students often prefer the very popular schools. ... Places around the college to visit. Bunking is nowadays a very common thing every student does. ... Class schedules. It

Name: Sai Sreeja Nainala
Review_Text: More opportunities to the students and explosure to clubs and chapters which helps them to learn more besided academics teach them managing skills and lead the group The campus is every beautiful and attractive Biometric systems are installed every where to keep track of students activities

Name: Arpit Khandelwal
Review_Text: Boys are given extra 2 hrs of outing than girls. Fees structure is not so affordable for people who's economically background is not strong Sometimes you have to walk to your hostels back for the mess at afternoon in limited time

Name: Deekshith Reddy
Review_Text: College projects and research works , food Friends and fun in classroom along with good learning environment Project works to make our bonf together and get well

Name: Pranjal Bansal
Review_Text: Alot of assignments , frequent exams and stress Pressured dude to competition and less time to study High fees and expenses are more in the times

Name: Kaustuv Sankalp
Review_Text: One of my senior got placed in Couch Base for 34LPA CTC another got placed in Unilever for 42LPA but this was for CSE and related branches while few of my seniors got decent package from mechanical branch too 8-12L in companies like Mercedes a Euler  ~ Anonymous, B.Tech FFCS. Name: Ayush Khare
Review_Text: I don’t like how the student and faculty ratio is 60-40  ~ Praveen Kumar, BCA Lot of exams yearly 3 exams in a semester 2-3 quiz and 1-2 DA  ~ Kartik Navnath Narare, B.Tech Water is really bad. 750+ TDS. It makes you go bald. Really.  ~ Piyush Prajapati, B.Des

Name: CHAITANYA VARMA
Review_Text: Campus life including events and workshops Amiable faculties and their teaching manner Hostel facilities, meals and cleanliness

Name: Nayeem khan
Review_Text: Establishment of 1 girls hostel in current Online classes being held due to unavailability of rooms Availability of only one canteen in the campus

Name: Gautam Batra
Review_Text: Faculties are a good part of vit. They are well read and they try to focus on what you know and what you don't know Clubs and tech events at vit will make you indulged in group activities Vityarthi courses provide you with extra support for free in your coding career

Name: Akash R
Review_Text: The building and campus is still under construction which is the owrst part There is not much exposure to everything to the freshers. There is no facilities to listen to your complaints as a intake is high

Name: Satvik gupta
Review_Text: Greenery and good vibe of the campus. Places to enjoy and hangout with friends Good research opportunities which the campus provides good hostel and mess facilities, followed by open areas and courts.

Name: Venkat vinay velaga
Review_Text: High number of people and competition in the college Campus life is great, i love it. I have great friends and a nice room. The labs are very high-tech and that is very good.

Name: Jugal Suggala
Review_Text: The teachers are also very helpful and that makes me comfortable. The fees is very high compared to other colleges There is a lot of crowd with more than 40k ppl studying here.

Name: Aksh bansal
Review_Text: I would have liked the avg placement to be higher but its fine because a lot of students get picked by mass recruiters I have liked the hostel Life in the college The academic building is good with new architecture
